object.description: Affects all creature whose Toughness is lower than your Willpower. All creatures with Undead or Daemonic Traits gain Unstable Trait. If they already had Unstable Trait, their Wounds are reduced to 0.
object.name: Banishment

object.description: You  gain the Distracting Creature Trait.
object.name: Distracting

object.description: Gain Ward (9+) Creature Trait.
object.name: Ward

object.description: Your voice originates from a point within Willpower yards rather than from you.
object.name: Murmured Whisper

object.description: You can clearly hear what the target is saying.
object.name: Eavesdrop

object.description: Create a blast that counts as magic missile (Damage +3) that applies to everyone in the affected area.
object.name: Blast

object.description: Everyone in the affected area gains +10 to all Fellowship Tests and Animosity and Hatred Psychologies are suppressed.
object.name: Goodwill

object.description: Remove all non-magical impurities (such as poison) form water in a container. Non-water liquids are turned into water.
object.name: Purify Water

object.description: Target cannot use Talents and cannot add Skill Advances when making Skill Tests.
object.name: Treason of Tzeentch

object.description: You can move an un-animated object with your mind. with a Strengths equal to your Willpower.
object.name: Move Object

object.description: You can see invisible creatures even those impossible to see.
object.name: Part the Branches

object.description: Instantly melt a metallic object. If the object was being worn, the wearer take magic missile Damage +WP Bonus that ignores Toughness Bonus.
object.name: Crucible of Chamon

object.description: You open a crack in the ground. Affected targets have to pass a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test to avoid falling in. When the spell ends, the crack closes crushing everyone inside for 20 Damage and burying them alive. Buried targets are subject to Suffocation.
object.name: Crevasse

object.description: Provides the target with clarity and resolve. They get +2 SL to all Tests to resist Charm and Intimidation. If you cast it at yourself you may chose to receive +2 SL to Charm Tests instead.
object.name: Driving Intent

object.description: You can see Winds of Magic more clearly. You can see corruption (how many points) and mutations in civilised species, but not in plants or animals. You can see if creatures have Corrupted Trait. You also suffer -2 SL to vision-based Perception Tests and gain +20 bonus to Second Sight Tests to read the winds.
object.name: Eyes of Volans

object.description: Creates a cage with bars made out of gold. Bars can be bend apart by passing a Hard (-20) Strength Test or cut with tools.
object.name: Gilded Cage

object.description: Reinforces object with a golden cover. It increases its Armour by 4. Taking cover behind the object reduces Corruption by 2 levels and grants +1 SL to Dispel Tests made against spells targeting you.
object.name: Goldsteel Shielding

object.description: Everyone in the AoE gains Strider - Woodlands Talent or +1 to its level if they already had it. For each +2 SL gain 1 more level of Strider. If you achieved +4 SL you can pass without trace.
object.name: Paranoth’s Pathway

object.description: The Critical Hit rolls against you are modified by -10. You gain Resistance to Poison, Disease, and Chaos Talents. If you already have these Talents, gain +1 level per +2 SL instead.
object.name: Amaranth

object.description:
If cast on a person's limb, it becomes completely useless and counts as amputated for WP Bonus minutes. 
Can also be cast as a ward on a grave. Whoever tries to uncover it, becomes subject to a curse that affects a random limb for WP Bonus days.
object.name: Limbwither

object.description: You set your body on fire. Anyone attempting to grab or grapple you suffer 8 + SL Damage. Every turn they must Hard (-20) Cool Test or are forced to let you go. Every time you take damage in melee combat, you attacker must pass Challenging (+0) Dodge Test or suffer a magic missile hit with Damage +3 that ignores Armour
object.name: Body of Fire

object.description: Summons a huge worm that wriggles to the target. The target suffers an Entangled Condition and it is Grappled (Strength 50). If the target loses grappling Opposed Strength Test, the worm can either add another Entangled Condition or dissolve 1 point of leather armour on all locations.
object.name: Writhing Worm

object.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Beastmen. If any Beastmen come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
object.name: Fellstave - Beastmen

object.description: Spells being cast in the AoE have their CN cost halved. The casting Tests have Average (+20) Difficulty. Everyone in the AoE must pass an Average (+20) Endurance at the end of each Rounds or they gain 1 Corruption point.
object.name: Power of Chaos

object.description: The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test, or gain 1 Corruption point + 1 more for each 2 SL. If the target reaches Mutation threshold, they roll on Mental Mutations table and gain 1 Ablaze Condition.
object.name: Mindfire

object.description: The target suffers from Prone Condition, and is considered Helpless for the duration of the Spell. At the end of the duration, they must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test opposed by your Language - Magick Skill. If they lose the Test, they gain 1 Corruption point + 1 for every SL they lost by.
object.name: Transformation of Tzeentch

object.description: You transform into a Gor (WFRP p. 331). Your characteristics are either your own or that of Gor (whichever is higher). Gain Armour 1, Fury, and Horns +6 Creature Traits. You also gain Language - Beast Tongue but lose ability to speak in any other language.
object.name: Transformation of the Beast

object.description: While the spell lasts, the target loses all memories that involve you. Once the spell is over, the target has to pass an Average (+20) Intelligence Test or the memory loss becomes permanent (can be dispelled though).
object.name: Mindslip

object.description: Create a number (up to your Int Bonus) of small flickering lights. After passing an Average (+20) Channelling Test you can send the lights moving in any direction.
object.name: Marsh Lights

object.description: Gain Fear 1. For every +2 SL increase Fear by 1.
object.name: Fearsome

object.description: You enchant a small charm with spell of protection. The wearer gains Magic Resistance Talent. If the wearer already has this talent, the charm has no effect.
object.name: Protective Charm

object.description: You can talk to creatures with Bestial Trait and get +20 to all Charm Animal and Animal Training Tests. While active you cannot speak non-bestial tongues.
object.name: Beast Tongue

object.description: Target becomes invisible to anyone without Second Sight Talent. Those with Second Sight must pass Challenging (+0) Perception Test to notice someone is nearby.
object.name: Shroud of Invisibility

object.description: Detects any Daemons in any form in the range.
object.name: Detect Daemon

object.description: Pull a small animal out of bag, pocket, etc. The animal must be appropriate to the location.
object.name: Produce Small Animal

object.description: Teleport to a point up to WP Bonus yards. For every +2 SL you can increase the distance by WP Bonus yards.
object.name: Teleport

object.description: Bring death to a target with 0 Wounds and at least 2 Critical Wounds. Target cannot be raised as Undead.
object.name: Swift Passing

object.description: The Fenbeast gains the Frenzy Trait.
object.name: Belligerence of the Bloodmarsh

object.description: Learning XP: 400. Has CN equal to Daemon's Willpower. Summons a Daemon inside the Octagram.
object.name: Invocate Daemon

object.description: Learning XP: 400. CN is equal to Undead entity's Willpower. Creates a barrier that cannot be crossed by Undead creatures.
object.name: The Crossed Scythes

object.description: Lets you understand almost any language. The exceptions are Dark Tongue and some obscure ancient languages. Even though you understand it, you cannot communicate in it.
object.name: Perfect Comprehension

object.description: Can be used to either repaid a damaged metal item (of any size) or fuse objects together.
object.name: Metal Mended

object.description: Summons a geyser that deals magic missile Damage + 4 to targets in the AoE. They also get knocked back WP Bonus yards in a direction of your choice, and receive Prone Condition. For every +2 SL you can give any single target a Stunned Condition.
object.name: Geyser

object.description: Trap target's soul in a bottle.Their body stays in coma until the bottle is re-opened nearby. Body has to be fed or it will die. When awakened, the target must Test for exposure to a Moderate Source of Corruption.
object.name: Animus Imprisoned

object.description: You become cognisant of all deaths that happened within the last month + 1 month for each +1 SL. If you are aware of a deceased person's name, you can ask them one question per additional +2 SL, which must be able to be answered through knocks.
object.name: Shyish Uncovered

object.description:
A single (primary) target must Test for Minor
Exposure to Corruption and then pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or receive an Unconscious Condition. All enemies in I Bonus yards of primary target must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or receive a Stunned Condition. Anyone that did not pass the Cool Test, must pass an Easy (+40) Cool Test or receive a Fatigued Condition and Psychology - Despair.
object.name: Taste of Death

object.description: Summon 2 purple shadow hounds. They're invisible but a Hard (-20) Perception Test reveals them as beasts with sharp fangs. During you round they can attack within 4 yards. They have Weapon Skill 50 and Weapon - Bite (+8) Trait. They cannot be attacked and do not gain Advantage.
object.name: Wild Kin of Zandox

object.description: Create a burning head that strikes all targets in its path. It causes magic missile with Damage + 4 (or +0 passes a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test). Everyone gets 1 Ablaze condition, and if they lose at least 1 Wound, they treat you as if you had Fear (1) Trait.
object.name: Burning Head

object.description: You make a domestic animal become wild. With +4 SL you can cast in on Humans. Humans can try to resist with a Difficult (-10) Willpower Test. The target grow thick body hair, lose speech, and starts behaving like a wild animal. The spell lasts until dispelled.
object.name: Beast Unbroken

object.description: Transform yourself into a Large on Enormous Beast. If you achieve +4 SL or more, you can chose an optional Creature Trait or cast this spell on someone else instead. If you cast it on someone else, they can resist with an Opposed Willpower Test.
object.name: Transformation of Kadon

object.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Orcs and Goblins. If any Orcs or Goblins come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
object.name: Fellstave - Orcs and Goblins

object.description:
Your body transforms and assumes aspects of a
Daemon loyal to your patron god. The trait is determined by 1d10 roll on the table on page 78. Each +2 SL lets you roll again and increase the duration. When the spell should end, you may make a WP Test to extend the Duration for+1 Round.
object.name: Daemonic Mien

object.description: You gain Ward 9+ Creature Trait.
object.name: Tzeentch's Golden Aura

object.description: Stab a puppet to cause harm to a target. Type of harm depends on the stabbed body part.
object.name: Curse of Crippling Pain

object.description: Target gains the Regenerate Creature Trait.
object.name: Regenerate

object.description: One of the ingredients must be an object belonging to the target. Target receives -10 to all Tests and cannot spend Fortune Points.
object.name: Curse of Ill-Fortune

object.description: Create a spear that deals magic missile hit Damage +12 and pierces through leather and fur Armour. If the target suffers any Wounds, they also receive 1 Bleeding Condition, and the spear passes through, striking next target in its path. The spear deals -1 Damage for each target it goes through. If it does not cause any Wound on the target, the spear stops. Inflicts a minimum of 1 Wound on the first target.
object.name: The Amber Spear

object.description: The target must be looking at you. If you win Opposed Intimidate/Cool Test (add SL from casting roll to your result) the target gains +1 Fatigued Condition per +2 SL by which you win. If you win by 6 or more SL, they gain Broken Condition.
object.name: The Evil Eye

object.description: Teleport up to Willpower yards. Any Engaged enemies gain Surprised Condition.
object.name: Shadowstep

object.description: You change bodies of affected targets into metal. All targets take magic missile Damage +WP Bonus that ignores Toughness, +1 AP to all locations, receive +1 Blinded, Deafened,  Stunned Conditions that last whole duration of the spell, and suffer from Suffocation.
object.name: Transmutation of Chamon

object.description: Arcane spell. The Fenbeast gains the Distracting Creature Trait.
object.name: Fly-Infested Rotweed

object.description: Learning XP: 400. CN is equal to the beast’s Wounds. You project your will onto that of the target beast. You must win an Opposed Willpower Test against the creature to control it.
object.name: Bind Monstrous Beast

object.description: Learning XP: 400. Create a Power Stone of a type corresponding to the Lore of Magic you work with.
object.name: Create Power Stone

object.description: Learning XP: 500. Incarnate Elemental of Fire emerges from the pyre.
object.name: Conjuration of the Jack O' Cinders

object.description: Surrounds you with a magical field. Physical melee and missile attacks inflict only SL Wounds instead of their normal Damage. Magical attacks are unaffected. It completely protects you from other types of Damage (fire, falling, etc.). You can't hide while this spell lasts.
object.name: Pierce the Veil

object.description: Surrounds you with swirling leaves. Reduces Damage from falling, crushing, and blunt weapons by 3. Missile attacks against you suffer -2 SL, and you get Contortionist Talent.
object.name: Leaf Fall

object.description: Summon a 4-yard wide and 3-yard high arch of sapphire. Anything passing through it disappears into a limbo dimension and the arch vanishes after at the end of your next round. Next time you cast this spell, those inside return to the same spot without noticing time passed. If you die before recasting, they return at the original location, with Stunned and Prone Condition.
object.name: Sapphire Arch

object.description:
Create sound dampening aura that moves with target. Can't be cast on unwilling target, but can target objects. Select 1 of 3 forms at casting time:
No sounds leave AoE but sounds from outside can enter it.
No sounds enter AoE but sounds made inside AoE are unaffected.
No sounds are made in AoE.
object.name: Hush

object.description: Make the target dislike someone else. They are subject to Prejudice for WP bonus hours. If the two are friends, the target may may resist the spell with an Average (+20) Cool Test. With +4 SL the target is subject to Animosity for WP bonus days instead,  and with +8 SL they suffer from Hatred for WP bonus weeks instead.
object.duration: Willpower Bonus hours, days, or weeks
object.name: Choleric

object.description: Replenish all empty barrels of water on the ship.
object.name: Water Water Everywhere

object.description: +1 SL to Tests made to fire a ship's cannon.
object.name: Niezlib's Optimal Firing Solution

object.description: Deal magic missile with Damage +6. The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test, or gain 1 Corruption.
object.name: Bolt of Corruption

object.description: Make the target to appear without flaw. It hides any scars, deformities and Mutations. When the spell should end, you may make a Willpower Test to extend the Duration for +1 Round.
object.name: Joyous Aspect

object.description: Make an opposed WP Test. If won, the target forgets a randomly selected spell for 1 day for every SL of the opposed Test.
object.name: Curse of Tzeentch

object.description: Targets in the AoE suffer magic missile hit (Damage +9) and gain 1 Ablaze Condition. If Wounds of a target with size Small or larger are reduced to 0, roll 1d10. If you roll 9, the target dies and 2 Pink Horrors come out of its burning flesh.
object.name: Tzeentch's Firestorm

object.description: You have to be in direct contact with earth. All creatures with direct contact with earth in the affected area heal your WP Bonus Wounds at the start of every Round.
object.name: Earthblood

object.description: You gain the Dark Vision Creature Trait.
object.name: Dark Vision

object.description: After passing an Average (+20) Strength Test you can bend non-magical object made of metal.
object.name: Mutable Metal

object.description: Int Bonus Undead targets gain a free Move or Action (has to be the same for all targets). For every +2 SL, you can affect additional Int Bonus targets.
object.name: Vanhel's Call

object.description: You gain Corrosive Blood Creature Trait.
object.name: Corrosive Blood

object.description: Create a shadow steed. While not in sunlight it gains Dark Vision, Ethereal, Magical, Painless, Stealthy, Stride, Fear (1) and Ward (+9) Traits.
object.name: Shadowsteed

object.description: You raise the ground to create a crude wall. It counts as Hard Cover and Earthwork. Multiple castings can be use to create a building. It will collapse in Willpower Bonus + SL days unless you have or get an advice from someone with Lore - Engineering or Trade - Stoneworker skills.
object.name: Erect the Edifice

object.description:
Change the appearance of a target. Those who do not consent can resist with Opposed Willpower Test. Select from the available options:
+/- 10 Fel
Target appears to be dead. They cannot speak or move.
Target becomes unrecognisable to the people who know them.
object.name: Mutable Visage

object.description: You create a crop of purple herbs and put them in a pouch. The pouch provides wearer with +1 SL to any Cool Tests to resist supernatural effects and +1 SL to Endurance Tests to resist contracting diseases or suffering from Poisoned Conditions.
object.name: Protection Pouch

object.description: Over the course of the spell you find 1d10 pennies.
object.name: Silvertide

object.description: You open a portal to the Realms of Chaos. At the end of every Round, 1 + 1 for every +5 SL Lesser Daemons come through the portal. When the spell should end, you may make a WP Test to extend the Duration for+1 Round.
object.name: Rend Aethyr

object.description: You ask you god to take the soul of your target. You must win an Opposed Willpower Test  by at least 2+ SL. If you Fumble the Test, your soul is taken instead.
object.name: Slave to Darkness

object.description: Gain Fury Creature Trait.
object.name: Bestial Rage

object.description: The ground shakes as you stomp. All targets in WP Bonus yards have to make an Ag Test or fall down and gain a Prone Condition.
object.name: Tremor

object.description: Magic missile (Damage +4). If it reduces Wounds to 0, it jumps to another target within spell's initial range and within Willpower Bonus yards of the previous target.
object.name: Chain Attack

object.description: Create blight (permanent) in a well, field, or a domestic animal.
object.name: Blight

object.description: Water bubbles from the ground at a rate of 1 pint per Round for Initiative Bonus Rounds.
object.name: Spring

object.description: Gain +1 Fortune Point and +1 additional point for each +2 SL. All extra points are lost if not spent before end of the spell.
object.name: The First Portent of Amul

object.description: Targets receives magic missile Damage +6 that ignores Armour and  +1 Fatigued Condition. Remove all Fatigued Conditions you have currently and restore up to half (rounded up) of Wounds dealt.
object.name: Steal Life

object.description: Casting Test is Opposed by Daemon's (creature with Daemonic Trait) Willpower Test. If succeeded the Daemon is destroyed and everyone looking at the process receive +SL Blinded Conditions unless they posses Arcane Magic (Light) Talent.
object.name: Daemonbane

object.description: Learning XP: 300. Alters the properties of a Waystone to create an Amplification, Containment, Dampening, or Refraction effect.
object.name: Create Waystone Property

object.description:
Summons a blood forest on a patch of earth. Anyone standing in the AoE takes 10 Damage and receives Bleeding Condition. Anyone passing the blood forest at more than half of their Movement speed, must pass a Challenging (+0) Agility Test
or suffer a Bleeding Condition.
object.name: Gardener’s Warcry

object.description: Lets you telepathically communicate with minor river or tree spirits.
object.name: Nature’s Whisper

object.description: Gain +10 S for every +1 SL and automatically succeed on all grapple attacks.
object.name: Iyrtu's Embrace

object.description: Give the target Regenerate Creature Trait. If the target is not an Ogre, when regenerating wounds, they pass an Average (+20) Endurance Test or the regenerated flesh will become green or blue (similar to Troll's skin).
object.name: Trollguts

object.description: You devour a large beast to summon the Maw. Anyone in the AoE must take a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test. If they pass, they take Damage +8 hit with Damage reduced by 1 for each Dodge Test SL. Those who fail, fall in the Maw. They gain 3 Entangled Conditions (Strength 60) and take a Damage +10 hit. They cannot escape until all Entangled Conditions are removed. At the end of their turn they suffer Damage +10 hit.
object.name: The Maw

object.description: You bathe a blade into the he blood of a freshly fallen foe. Any creatures you chose in AoE gain Vampiric Creature Trait. To benefit from it they only need to wound someone in melee combat (instead of biting). Unwilling targets may try to oppose it with a Difficult (+20) Endurance Test.
object.name: Feast of the Fallen

object.description: The target suffers magic missile hit (Damage +6) and gains 1 Ablaze Condition. If Wounds of a target with size Small or larger are reduced to 0, roll 1d10. If you roll 9, the target dies and 1 Pink Horror comes out of its writhing corpse.
object.name: Pink Fire of Tzeentch

object.description: Reanimate WP Bonus + SL dead bodies as Zombies or Skeletons. For each +2 SL, you may raise extra WP Bonus + SL creatures.
object.name: Reanimate

object.description: Gain Flight (Agility) Creature Trait.
object.name: Flight

object.description: Turn any metal into gold.
object.name: Fool's Gold

object.description: Detect if the object is poisoned or trapped.
object.name: Warning

object.description: Target gain 1 Blinded Condition, and 1 Blinded Condition at the start of each Round for as long as the spell lasts.
object.name: Dazzle

object.description: Gain +1 Fate. The point is lost if not spent before end of the spell.
object.name: The Third Portent of Amul

object.description: Create an illusion in the affected area. Only those with Second Sight Talent, if they pass a Difficult (-10) Perception Test, can notice that they are looking at an illusion.
object.name: Illusion

object.description: Make a Breath attack as if you had spent 2 Advantage to activate the Breath Creature Trait.
object.name: Stream of Corruption

object.description: Your spirit separates from the body that remains immobile and suffer Prone Condition. The spirit is invisible, immune to non-megical damage and can go through physical obstacles. It also has all you characteristics, skills, etc. and can cast spells. You can interact with other invisible creatures, spirits, ethereal creatures, and Daemons.
object.name: Mirkride

object.description: The target is attacked by swarm of Giant Rats, Giant Spiders, or Snakes. The swarm uses stats of regular creature with an extra Swarm Trait.
object.name: Creeping Menace

object.description: Bring life a desolated or blighted area. For example a barren field or dry riverbed.
object.name: Lifebloom

object.description: Learning XP: 400. Creates a Construct to serve its master. For the cost of extra CN, it can have additional traits.
object.name: Create Construct

object.description: Lifts the target 2 yards above the ground. It gets 2 Entangled Conditions with a Strength equal to your Willpower.
object.name: Abulla's Snare

object.description: Pale hands from the ground grab Targets' feet. Any target that fails a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test, becomes Grappled with a Strength equal to your Willpower.
object.name: Hands of Karkora

object.description: For every target in the affected area chose one: Do not count as Overburdened or Count as two steps more Overburdened.
object.name: Feather of Lead

object.description: Turns a non-magical metal object into rust making it useless. If you achieve +4 SL, the spell can also affect non-metal objects by making them brittle for WP Bonus minutes. Can be cast on object of 1 Encumbrance + 1 Encumbrance for each +2 SL.
object.name: Curse of Rust

object.description: All Channel and Cast Test suffer from -1 SL. When the spell expires, you may add +1 to a single Casting Test of spell of any colour. The bonus expires after 2 Rounds if not used.
object.name: Prismatic Refraction of Habermas

object.description: Unarmed attacks count as Magical and deal Damage equal to your WP Bonus. If you attack cause Wounds, inflict +1 Bleeding condition.
object.name: Amber Talons

object.description: Gain +WP Bonus AP on all locations, and Fear (1) Trait. For every +2 SL you may increase your Fear rating by 1.
object.name: Purple Pall of Shyish

object.description: Target suffers -10 to all Tests. Only 1 curse can be placed on any target at the same time. If you achieve +6 SL, you may chose to cast Fate of Doom instead. It makes the target permanently lose 1 Fate point.
object.name: Curse of Fate

object.description: Forces all enemy wizards within the AoE to roll twice on any Channelling, Casting, and Dispel Tests. They have to select the worse roll.
object.name: Solmann’s Discombobulation

object.description: Affected compass behaves as a Compass of Meteoric Silver
object.name: Puchta's Silver Compass

object.description: Select 4 random vortex spells or groups of enemies to push them away from you. The distance is equal to your WP Bonus yards and can be increased by WP Bonus yards per +2 SL. Enemies that hit an obstacle or another character take 7 damage and become Prone.
object.name: Let the Four Winds Blow!

object.description: Communicate with a distant target via mirror or similar reflecting surface. Your reflection becomes visible and your voice can be heard from the target's mirror, and vice versa. You must know the target's name or have met them before.
object.name: Mystic Mirror

object.description: Turns target into a living stone. They can't talk and don't have to breathe. Their movement is halved, they get +30 to Strength and Toughness, and +4 AP to all locations. Unwilling targets can try to resist the spell by making an Opposed Willpower Test.
object.name: Flesh of Stone

object.description:
Lets you sense nearby leylines and stone
circles. It gives +2 SL to Navigation Tests to finds leylines. You can sense leyline's strength and number of waystones in stone circles.
object.name: Leyfinding

object.description:
Trap targets in Aethyr maze. At the end of their rounds, each one rolls 1d10:
1-3: They return to  original location.
4-6: Roll again next round.
7-9: Is lost for 1d10 hours and must  resist a Moderate Exposure to Corruption when they return.
10: Lost forever.
object.name: Crystal Maze

object.description: You can chose 1 of 3 effects. Learn the best time for a future action. Locate lost or stolen object. Modify a single future die roll by plus or minus 10.
object.name: Divination

object.description: All friendly wizards within the AoE (not including yourself) may reroll their first failure on all Channelling, Casting, and Dispel Tests.
object.name: Fantastic Foresight

object.description: If used on a non-magical object it instantly ages it and it turns to dust. Object can have a max of 2 Encumbrance + 1 for every +2 SL. With more than +4 SL it can be used on living creatures. The creature must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or grow older in a matter of seconds and permanently lose 1d10 of S and T each. Daemons, Undead, and plants are immune.
object.name: Tide of Years

object.description: You can sense target's intentions or destiny. If you touch them, you can chose to see their Dooming and curses instead.
object.name: Fate Illuminated

object.description:
Chose 1 of the 3 effects:
1. Post food becomes extremely spicy.
2. Jug of liquid becomes a strong alcohol.
3.  Flask of liquid becomes a highly flammable oil.
object.name: Taste of Fire

object.description:
Target must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test or they become confused. Roll 1d10 for confusion effect: 
1-2: Must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test to take actions.
3-4: Move in a random direction.
5-6: Charge and Attack the nearest target.
7-8: Can only stand still and Dodge.
9-10: Receive Prone condition and become Helpless.
object.name: Bewilder

object.description: Allows you to control your detached shadow and see, hear, and smell from it. Directing its movement takes an Action. It is destroyed by direct sunlight or if it moves beyond 48 yards from a light source. It causes Fear (1) but cannot attack.
object.name: Wandering Shadow

object.description: -30 penalty to Track Tests for anyone trying to track you in rural area.
object.name: Careful Step

object.description: Gain +20 to Track and Perception Tests that rely on smell, including Second Sight Tests to smell magic. You can also smell Corruption and Mutation in plants. animals, and animal dung.
object.name: Follow Scent

object.description:
Create a foul smelling musk. If you use it on character or object, you gain +2 SL to locate it later. Alternatively, you can mark an area (up to WP Bonus yards) as your territory. Wild animals will only enter if they are desperate and pass an Average
(+20) Cool Test. The smell lasts for 1 day + extra day for every +2 SL.
object.name: Musk Spray

object.description: Grow thick fur that protects you against attacks and cold. You are immune to Cold Exposure and Critical Hit rolls are reduced by 10. You also suffer -10 to Fel and Ag.
object.name: Winter Coat

object.description: You devour an entire head to gain Fear 2 Creature Trait. If the late owner of the devoured head had a close relationship to someone who is affected by your Fear Trait, they make any Cool Tests to resist the Fear at a -20 penalty.
object.name: Braingobbler

object.description: Add +WP Bonus SL to any dispelling you do.
object.name: Magic Shield

object.description: Gain +20 T, Dark Vision and Fear (1) Creature Traits, and Acute Sense - Smell Talent.
object.name: Hunter's Hide

object.description: +2 SL to all Navigation Tests made by you individually or as part of a Crew.
object.name: Blessings of Bel Shanaar

object.description: If the target needs to breath, they get +1 Fatigued Condition, cannot talk, and suffer from Suffocation.
object.name: Choking Shadows

object.description: You consume a part of a corpse to learn how and when the creature died.
object.name: Taste Death

object.description: Targets in the AoE suffer magic missile hit (Damage +3) and gain 1 Ablaze Condition. If Wounds of a target with size Small or larger are reduced to 0,  roll 1d10. If you roll 9, the target dies and 2 Blue Horrors come out of its burning flesh.
object.name: Blue Fire of Tzeentch

object.description: Create a screaming skull that moves in a straight line. Anyone in its path without Undead Trait takes magic missile Damage +WP Bonus. Anyone who lost Wounds due to this spell must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain Broken Condition.
object.name: Screaming Skull

object.description: When you cast this spell honey drips from your lips. You must catch it in a cup. Whoever drinks from the cup, they fall in love in the first person they would find romanticallly appaeling.
object.name: Lovelock

object.description: Beastmen of Tzeentch are friendly to you. Gain +20 Fel to all Tests dealing with them. Followers of Khorne and Slaanesh suffer Animosity towards you. Followers of Nurgle suffer Hatred towards you.
object.name: Sign of the Beast

object.description: Apply the Doldrums effect from the Wind Effect Table to your ship.
object.name: Sea of Glass

object.description: Create a small flame in your hand. The flame emits light and heat.
object.name: Magic Flame

object.description: Gain +SL Armour Points to all locations  when calculating damage from melee attacks. If attacked by metal weapon, the attacker takes +WP Bonus Damage.
object.name: Cerulean Shield

object.description: Invisible minor daemons will carry your message (max 25 words). For every +2 SLs, you may double the length of the message.
object.name: Foul Messenger

object.description: Select a target you can see. You discover the target's Motivation, Short-Term Ambition, and Long-Term Ambition.
object.name: Sense the Skein

object.description: Raise SL+1 Skeletons in the affected area. For each +2 SL, you may summon extra SL Skeletons.
object.name: Raise Dead

object.description: Open any non-magical lock.
object.name: Open Lock

object.description:
The target must take Opposed Int Test with you. If they lose, they gain 1 Stunned +1 for each SL they lost by. If they Fumble, they gain the Unconscious Condition and 1 Corruption point.
After all Conditions are removed, they must pass an Average (+20) Endurance Test or gain 1 Corruption Point. If they Fumble, they get 1 mental mutation and cannot not take a Short-term Ambition for the next 1d10 weeks.
object.name: Word of Tzeentch

object.description: Cause rot to fist-sized volume of organic material such as food, cloth, or leather. Leather armor loses 1 AP on 1 location.
object.name: Rot

object.description: Push back all living creatures within WP Bonus yards. The creatures are pushed back by WP bonus yards and gain Prone Condition. For every +2 SL, the creatures are pushed by an extra WP Bonus yards.
object.name: Push

object.description: Convince a creature with Bestial Trait that you are its pack master. It will instinctively understand your intentions.
object.name: Beast Master

object.description: Gain + 1 AP to all Hit Locations.
object.name: Aethyric Armour

object.description: Target gains + 2 Toughness Bonus and -10 to Ag and Dex.
object.name: Barkskin

object.description: Assume form any familiar humanoid. Only those with Second Sight Talent, if they pass a Difficult (-10) Perception Test, can notice that you are disguising your form.
object.name: Doppelganger

object.description: After successful Casting Test, make an Opposed Willpower/Toughness Test against the construct. If successful, the construct becomes lifeless.
object.name: Collapse Construct

object.description: Learning XP: 500. The twin-headed serpentine form of an Incarnate Elemental of Death hatches from the hourglass.
object.name: Conjuration of the Incarnate Elemental of Death

object.description: Learning XP: 400. Marsh matter and vegetation coalesce into the form of a Fenbeast.
object.name: Materialise the Living Swamp

object.description: A burst of purest light makes everyone in the affected area gain 1 Blinded Condition unless they possess the Arcane Magic (Light) Talent. All Daemons also gain 1 Stunned Condition.
object.name: Dazzling Brightness

object.description: Alters the time. All allies in the affected area receive an extra action. Bonus actions are executed in initiative order.
object.name: Time Amok

object.description: Awakes and/or invigorates plant-based creatures. They immediately heal SL Wounds and get +SL to all Tests. If the creatures were dormant, they have to wait 1 round before they can act.
object.name: Invigorating Chant

object.description: Transform target into an amber statue. They can try to resist by passing a Hard (-20) Cool Test. The spell ends if the statue is attacked but the first attack does not do damage. A willing target can enter a state of extended hibernation that lasts until the next equinox or solstice.
object.name: Amber Trance

object.description:
Deals magic missile hit with Damage
+4 to all targets. Everyone in the AoE must also pass an Average (+20) Dodge Test or receive Bleeding and Entangled (Strength 30) Conditions.
object.name: Awakening of the Wood

object.description: Summon small spirits to harass foes in AoE, causing -2 to Movement, and -20 to WS, BS, and Agi. Targets that leave AoE are followed by the spirits but suffer only -1/-10 penalties. Mounts are scared away and flee unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
object.name: Curse of Anraheir

object.description: The target can see through your eyes.
object.name: Eyes of the Pack

object.description: All Fel Test receive +10 bonus. Animosity and Hatred Psychologies have no effect.
object.name: Goodwill

object.description: The creature with Ethereal or Daemonic Trait must pass a Challenging (+0) WP Test or suffer a number of Wounds equal to your WP Bonus. If this reduces their Wounds to 0 or belowe they are banished and canot return for 1d10 years.
object.name: The Ousting

object.description: The Target suffers magic missile hit (Damage +7) and must pass a a Challenging (+0) Endurance or gain 1 Corruption point. On a fumble, the target immediately rolls for a Mutation, and gains the Chaos Magic - Tzeentch Talent.
object.name: Bolt of Change

object.description: Cause fear in a single ordinary animal. If it fails a WP Test to resist, it acts strangely. The outcomes range from gaining Broken Conditions to instant death. To determine the effect, roll 1d10 on a table from page 98.
object.name: Enrage Beast

object.description: Make a Breath attack (as if you spent 2 Advantage to activate the Breath Creature Trait). Breath attack count as magic missile (Damage +T Bonus).
object.name: Breath

object.description: Gain Terror (1) Creature Trait.
object.name: Terrifying

object.description: Summons a flock of local birds. The birds attack everyone who does not have Arcane Magic - Beasts Talent by inflicting +7 Damage at the end of every round. Everyone within affected area gains +1 Blinded Condition. After passing an Average (+20) Charm Animal you can move the flock within the range.
object.name: Flock of Doom

object.description: Creates protective barrier against creatures with Daemonic or Undead Traits, mutations, and those with more Corruption points that WP Bonus + T Bonus. They cannot enter and if they are already in, they gain Broken Condition until they leave. No one in the protected area cannot gain any Corruption Points.
object.name: Pha's Protection

object.description: Everyone in the affected area that do not have Arcane Magic (Shadows) Talent gains +1 Blinded, Deafened, and Fatigued Conditions which stay for the whole duration of the spell. Affected targets that try to move have to pass a Challenging (+0) Perception Test or receive Prone Condition.
object.name: Mystifying Miasma

object.description: Reduce target's Initiative to 10. During its Turn all movement is random and they can perform Action only after passinf a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
object.name: Acquiescence

object.description: Create wall of fire that is WP Bonus yards wide, and 1 yard deep. Anyone trying to cross it receives magic missile Damage +WP Bonus and gains 1 Ablaze Condition. For each +2 SL you can extend the wall by WP Bonus yards.
object.name: Firewall

object.description: Create a melee weapon with Damage equal to your WP Bonus. This weapon counts as magical.
object.name: Aethyric Arms

object.description:
The affected Fenbeast regenerates double the number
of Wounds it normally does.
object.name: Lifebloom Silt

object.description: Learning XP: 450. Corrupts the waystone.
object.name: Corrupt Waystone

object.description: Affected targets gain a magical, weightless armour giving them Ward (4+) Creature Trait.
object.name: Meteoric Ironclad

object.description: You cannot be Surprised.
object.name: Enemy Foreseen

object.description: Make enemies dance uncontrollably and lose focus. They can resist with a WP Test. If they fail, thy can't move or take any actions. To stop dancing, they must pass a Hard (-20) Athletics Test or Challenging Perform (Dance) Test. After the spell expires affected targets gain Fatigued Condition. Does not affect friendly and neutral characters.
object.name: Dance of Despair

object.description: Summon grey birds to teleport you or one target up to 100 yards +100 yards for every +2 SL on Casting Test. Unwilling targets can Dodge with Easy (+40) Test.
object.name: Grey Wings

object.description: Revels shadows of all creature, even those invisible. Possessed creatures have 2 shadows: their own and the daemon. Attacks against revealed creatures have -10 penalty.
object.name: Shadow Grove

object.description:
You boil target's blood. If they resist a Difficult
(-10) Endurance Test, they immediately receive 2 Blinded Conditions and at the start of their round they receive 10 + SL Damage that ignores Armour. Anyone killed by this spell explodes. The explosion deals magic missile hit with Damage +1 to everyone within 2 yards.
object.name: Boiling Blood

object.description: Gain +1 Movement and Scale Sheer Surface and Strider (any one) Talents. If you already have them add 1 level + 1 more for each +2 SL. Gain +10 on Tests to avoid Entangled Conditions.
object.name: Quick Passage

object.description: Create an amber light aura that protects you against non-magical attacks. Every time attack successfully hits you, make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test. If you pass the Test, reduce damage taken by WP Bonus + SL. If the attack is reduced to 0, it is deflected. Deflected Ranged attacks hit a random target within 2 yards of you and deflected Melee attacks hit the attacker.
object.name: Vengeful Hood

object.description: Gain Night Vision Creature Trait. If you already have it, your vision range doubles.
object.name: Eyes of the Beast

object.description: Gain +10 to one of: WS, T, ag, WP.
object.name: Bension of Tzeentch

object.description: |You touch a non-magic inanimate object. It comes soft and malleable. Weapons bend and break, Armour lose all AP. You can shape this material as you like.
object.name: Subvert Strength

object.description: You can become any Beast of the Beasts of the Reikland section of the Bestiary.
object.name: Beast Form

object.description: Preserve day's worth of food rations. While preserved the rations cannot go bad.
object.name: Conserve

object.description: Create a gust of wind strong enough to blow a candle or slam an open door.
object.name: Gust

object.description: Deal magic missile Damage +10 and inflict 1 Blinded Condition.
object.name: T'Essla's Arc

object.description: Create a small light (brightness of a torch) in your hand. If you pass an Average (+20) Channelling Test, the light can be adjusted to be of candle or lantern intensity.
object.name: Light

object.description: Everyone inside the dome gains Ward (6+) Creature Trait.
object.name: Dome

object.description: Affected targets gain +1 Drilled, Fearless, and Stout-hearted Talents. They also lose all Broken and Fatigued Conditions.
object.name: Flaming Hearts

object.description: Pool Fortune Points with everyone that has Arcane Magic (Heavens) Talent. After the spell ends, remaining Fortune Points are redistributed as fairly as possible.
object.name: Fate's Fickle Fingers

object.description: Call down a comet from the sky that deal magic missile Damage +12 to all affected targets at the end of the next round. Affected targets also gain Ablaze and Prone conditions.
object.name: Comet of Casandora

object.description: Gain +SL Fortune Point and +1 additional point for each +2 SL. All extra points are lost if not spent before end of the spell.
object.name: The Second Portent of Amul

object.description: Learning XP: 450. Create an Ogham Stone. It it can have one of the following waystone properties: Attraction, Containment, or Dampening
object.name: Carve Ogham Stone

object.description: Creates bridge with length and breadth equal to your WP Bonus yards. For every +2 SL you can increase width of breadth by your WP Bonus yards.
object.name: Bridge

object.description: You can inscribe a metal surface by passing your hand over it. With +2 SL, you can encode it as a Secret Rune. Can also be use as a magic missile with Damage +2.
object.name: Inscription

object.description: Chose a Skill. The target receives +2 SL to the next Test of that skill. If you achieved +2 SL on the Casting Test, the target also gets 1 re-roll of that Test.
object.name: Trial and Error

object.description: Thousands of tiny earth spirits try to pull enemies to into the ground. If they don't pass Strength Test, they are pulled undergrounds and trapped in a "space between worlds" for 1d10 hours. After re-emerging they need to pass a Test for Moderate Exposure to Corruption.
object.name: Dwellers Below

object.description: Create a soft glow of light around you, revealing invisible targets and banishing darkness (normal and magical) within the AoE. It also reveals concealed creatures and doors, and moves with you for the duration of the spell.
object.name: Starshine

object.description: Creates an illusion in the past that changes the presence. You can teleport a terrain feature such at tree boulder etc. as long as it is smaller than a house. It cannot be a famous landmark and the new location must be sensible. Characters occupying the terrain feature teleport along with it.
object.name: Ribauld's Retroactive Illusion

object.description: Everything in AoE becomes flammable. Everything that is already flammable takes +SL extra fire damage and receives an extra Ablaze Condition when damaged by fire.
object.name: Kindleflame

object.description: Summon a storm that causes magic missile hit with Damage +12 and inflicts 2 Ablaze Conditions. Every round it moved 8 yards or less it produces + 1 smaller vortex for every +2 SL. They immediately move randomly and last only one round. They inflict 1 Ablaze Condition and magic missile hit with Damage +4.
object.name: Magma Storm

object.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Daemons. If any Daemons come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
object.name: Fellstave - Daemons

object.description: Target ignores all Fatigued Conditions.
object.name: Invigorate

object.description: Deal magic missile with Damage +5 to all affected targets. Each target must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test, or gain 1 Corruption.
object.name: Blast of Corruption

object.description: Choose one Spell from any Lore. For the duration of the Boon of Tzeentch, you can cast the selected Spell as if you had memorised it.
object.name: Boon of Tzeentch

object.description: You can speak and understand Language - Beast Tongue.
object.name: Beast Tongue

object.description: Emit blinding bright light. Everyone who is looking at you and does not have Arcane Magic (Light) Talent, receives +SL Blinded Conditions.
object.name: Blinding Light

object.description: Cause a small object to move. If the object is currently being held, the holder must pass an Average (+20) Dexterity Test or they will drop it.
object.name: Twitch

object.description: Drain target's life. Deal damage that counts as magic missile with +0 Damage and then Heal 1 Wound.
object.name: Drain

object.description: After communicating with the earth for 1 minute you know a detailed layout of the land and all natural features within range. Each time you increase the range with Overcasting, increase communication time by 1 minute.
object.name: Lie of the Land

object.description: Summon a Lesser Daemon. If you win Opposed Channel - Dhar/Willpower you respond to your one command and vanish. If you lose the Test, it will attack you.
object.name: Manifest Lesser Daemon

object.description: Enchanted weapon counts as Magical, gains +WP Bonus to damage, and Unbreakable Quality. For every +3 SL you can add 1 Quality of remove 1 Flaw from the weapon.
object.name: Enchant Weapon

object.description: You move through the ground. After casting the spell, you disappear into the ground and reappear on the next Round at any point within Willpower yards. If you engage anyone after reappearing, they get a Surprised Condition.
object.name: Earthpool

object.description: Must be cast on already prepared draught. If the potion is drank while the spell is active, it heals WP Bonus Wounds and cures 1 disease +1 extra disease for every +2 SL.
object.name: Nostrum

object.description: You can spend Fortune Points to force opponents to reroll Tests.
object.name: Starcrossed

object.description: All targets in the affected area receive +1 Broken Condition. Undead targets receive magic missile Damage +10 that ignores Toughness Bonus and Armour.
object.name: Soul Vortex

object.description: The creature imminently recovers Wounds equal to its Toughness Bonus. If you achieve +3 SL or more, it recovers twice its Toughness Bonus.
object.name: Succour Magical Servant
object.target: One of your Familiars or Constructs

object.description:
Learning XP: 200. CN and learning XP are halved for the following Lores: Witchcraft, Daemonology, Necromancy,
or any Chaos Lore. Imbues an item with a magical ability (boon) and a dangerous side-effect (bane).
object.name: Cursecraft

object.description: Gives you an insight into a puzzle/riddle. Get 1 extra hint for each +2 SL. Relevant Lore Tests also receive a bonus of +2 SL
object.name: Knot Untied

object.description: Summon a tornado that causes violent havoc, hitting targets within the AoE with magic missile of Damage +8 and blowing them in a random direction, as per the rules of "Let the Four Winds Blow!" spell.
object.name: Thorsen's Thunderstorm

object.description: Summon ghostly shade to haunt a shadowed area, causing Fear (1). +2 SL on Casting Test increases Fear rating by 1 (max Fear 4). Shadow becomes magical, remains shadowed even when illuminated.
object.name: Black Horrors

object.description: Create a fire (of size of campfire) that cannot be extinguished by any means for WP bonus hours. With +2/4/6 SL the duration is extended to WP bonus days/weeks/months. The only way to extinguish the fire is to cast "Inextinguishable Flame" spell on it. Cannot be dispelled by any other means.
object.duration: Willpower Bonus hours, days, weeks, or months
object.name: Inextinguishable Flame

object.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Fimir. If any Fimir come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
object.name: Fellstave - Fimir

object.description: If you secceed an Opposed WP Test with the target, they receive -2 SL to any spell casting Tests from the Lores of Witchcraft, Necromancy, Daemonology, and all Chaos Lores.
object.name: Wyrd Ward

object.description:
If the target fails WP Test to resist the spell, you gain control over their body. If you try to force them to self-harm, they get another WP Test to try to break the spell. When the spell ends, the victim must make a Challenging (-10) WP Test or gain one
mutation from the Tzeentch column from p 66 of Enemy in Shadows Companion.
object.name: Slave to Chaos

object.description: Gain Fear (1) Trait, +1 War Leader Talent and +10 on all attempts to Channel and Cast  Aqshy. For each +2 SL you can increase Fear by +1 or take extra level of War Leader Talent.
object.name: Crown of Flame

object.description: You know where the North is.
object.name: Bearings

object.description: Create a circle that cannot be crossed by creatures with Undead Trait.
object.name: Sanctify

object.description: Target gains Entangled Condition with a Strength equal to your Int. For every +2 SL you may give the target an extra Entangled Condition. Lasts until all Entangled Conditions are removed.
object.name: Entangle

object.description: Set all flammable things on fire. All creatures receive +SL Ablaze Conditions. Burns all objects under Corrupting Influence. You can maintain this spell in subsequent rounds by passing a Challenging (+0) Channelling Test.
object.name: Purge

object.description: The location become haunted. Anyone in it, unless they have Magic (Witchcraft) Talent, gain +1 Fatigued Condition. They also need to pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain another +1 Fatigued Condition and Broken Condition.
object.name: Haunting Horror

object.description: Create a magic missile with +0 Damage.
object.name: Dart

object.description: You can talk to the soul of recently (up to 1 day) deceased.
object.name: Dying Words

object.description:
Successful cast reveals any curses on the item. If the item is indeed cursed, after successful reveal you must make a Challenging (+0) Intelligence Test. Failure means you suffer Moderate Exposure to
Corruption.
object.name: Decipher Curse

object.description: Allows to locate a desired scroll, tome, or grimoire, causing it to glow for Willpower Bonus + SL Rounds. It also contributes 1 + SL towards the target SL of an Extended Research Test.
object.name: Meissner’s Instantaneous Librarian

object.description: Creates golden sphere. Those inside are affected by Golden Touch spell.
object.name: Gehenna’s Golden Globe

object.description: The next living creature you touch changes into golden statue unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test. When petrified, they have 10 Toughness Bonus. If they receive any Wounds, the spell ends immedietly.
object.name: Golden Touch

object.description: You spend a day studying an area's natural flow of magic. After this time you can predict major seasonal and weather events. With +2 SL you can tell which week they will occur and with +4 SL you can tell the exact day.
object.name: Almanac

object.description: Transform target into a tree. While in a tree form, they can see and hear normally. Unwilling targets can attempt an Average (+20) WP Test to resist the spell.
object.name: Wood Shape

object.description: Separate your spirit from your body, which remains in a deep sleep. Your spirit is invisible and can pass through solid obstacles but cannot cast spells, communicate or manipulate objects. If you do not return to your body before the spell expires, you wake up and must Test against a Moderate Exposure to Corruption.
object.name: Project Spirit

object.description: Make an enemy treat you as an ally if they fail an Opposed Willpower Test. They can break the spell by passing a Challenging (+0) Cool Test when asked to attack a former ally, but won't follow suicidal orders. On a neutral target, it grants +2 SL to Fellowship Tests instead.
object.name: Traitor of Tarn

object.description: All enemies in the AoE receive a Fatigued Condition every round they attempt to run, charge, or flee. If they are touched by any fire, they receive Ablaze Condition. In addition they suffer extra +SL Damage when subjected to fire damage.
object.name: Withering Heat

object.description: You howl at a moon to invigorate all allies (and yourself) in the AoE. Everyone gains + 1 Movement and +10 to Strength and Toughness.
object.name: Hunter's Moons

object.description: All allies in the AoE gain +30 to Strength and Toughness (up to max 100). This spell does not affect you.
object.name: Merciw's Monstrous Regiment

object.description: Makes allies immune to Fear and Terror. Immediately remove 1 + SL Broken Condition from all allies.
object.name: The Ox Stands

object.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Undead. If any Undead come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
object.name: Fellstave - Undead

object.description:
Make palms of the target’s hands turn a deep
purple. Last 1 hour for every SL. To cast it, you must have some small amount matter from the target. Used to discipline Purple Hand co-conspirators.
object.name: The Purple Hand

object.description: Conjure a torrent of magical fire. Every living creature and Daemons that can see it can reroll every Test once, as if they had spent a Fortune Point. Each time they do it, the must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain 1 Corruption point. When the spell should end, you may make a WP Test to extend the Duration for+1 Round.
object.name: The Flickering Flames of Fickle Fate

object.description: Heals target's Wounds euqal to your Int + WP Bonuses. Targets may attempt a Very Hard (-30) Endurance Test to lose 1 Corruption point gained in the last hour.
object.name: Healing Light

object.description: Hurl a great fireball at an enemy that deals magic missile +10 Damage that ignores AP and inflicts +2 Ablaze Conditions and Prone Condition. Everyone in the affected area around the target, receives magic missile +5 Damage (ignores AP) and must pass a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test to avoid getting Ablaze Condition. Sets the ground on fire.
object.name: Great Fires of U'Zhul

object.description: Cover a sword in magical flames. The sword becomes +6 Damage and receives Impact Quality. Enemies hit by the affected sword gain +1 Ablaze Condition. If the wielder of the sword does not have Arcane Magic - Fire, they receive +1 Ablaze Condition whenever they fumble an attack. Talent
object.name: Flaming Sword of Rhuin

object.description: Keep yourself dry in rain, snow, etc.
object.name: Protection from Rain

object.description: Make friends with a creature (has Beast Trait) that is smaller than you.
object.name: Animal Friend

object.description: Create a powerful drink, that when drunk by someone, that someone can chose to completely forget one individual, permanently. The drink lasts WP Bonus rounds.
object.name: Nepenthe

object.description: Gain the Ward (9+) Trait against all attacks. Each hit saved, increases rating of the Ward by 1, up to a max of Ward (3+).
object.name: Glittering Robe

object.description: Create a scythe (Polearm). It deals WP Bonus +3 damage. Enemies with Undead Trait do not receive Advantage when Engaged in combat with you.
object.name: Scythe of Shyish

object.description: Create small noises nearby. If you pass an Average (+20) Channelling Test you can move the source of sounds or increase/decrease volume.
object.name: Sounds

object.description: Target gains +1 Stunned Condition that cannot be lost while the spell lasts. Creatures with Bestial Trait are immune.
object.name: Net of Amyntok

object.description: Become immune to non-magical fire and ignore Ablaze Condition. You also get Ward (9+) Creature Trait against magical fire attacks.
object.name: Aqshy's Aegis

object.description: Creates a zone of silence around the caster. No sound can't be heard inside the zone. People outside the zone cannot hear anything emanating from it. Casting from inside the zone suffers a penalty of -3 SL.
object.name: Silence

object.description: Learning XP: 100.  Imbues staff with magical symbology.
object.name: Imbue Staff

object.description: Enchants a light source. Everyone within light source gains Resistance - Disease Talent. All Wizards receive SL bonus to dispel Dark and Chaos magic. Range and duration are determined by the light source but cannot be more than 1 mile and 1 day.
object.name: Light of Purity

object.description: Allows you to telekinetically move an object with Encumbrance of up to Willpower Bonus + SL at a speed of Willpower Bonus. It also reduces by 1 level any Corruption Tests resulting from exposure to the object.
object.name: Orb of Hysh

object.description: Reduce any metal armour by 2 AP on every location.
object.name: Armour of Tin

object.description: Creates any simple object of up to 4 Encumbrance plus 1 for every +2 SL. It functions normally but a skilled person can recognise it's not natural. When spell expires, the object disappears. Alternatively, it conjures 1d10 Gold coins, plus 1d10 coins per +2 SL.
object.name: Replication of Levorg

object.description: Transport willing targets through air with shadows to a destination within line of sight up to WP yards (from start). You can fly with group if in AoE. Targets can't fly through solid objects, but they can fly over obstacles up to WP yards. Group arrives when spell expires.
object.name: Bridge of Shadows

object.description: Hide object in a pocket dimension. It becomes weightless and invisible. Containers with contents count as 1 object. Object must have Encumbrance of 1 + 1 for every +2 SL on Casting Test. The object cannot be found with Perception Tests. You can retrieve with an Action. The item is lost if spell duration ends before retrieval.
object.name: Deep Pockets

object.description: The Grand Illusion functions similarly to "Illusion" spell but it creates complete sensory illusions, including scent, touch, sound, taste, and appearance, not just static scenes. The illusion is real (has physical effects) to those who believe it.
object.name: Grand Illusion

object.description: Make a target invisible and intangible if fully within a shadow. Can be cast on inanimate objects. Material attacks don't affect it, but magical ones do. The target can interact with physical objects but the spell ends if it leaves the shadow.
object.name: Substance of Shadow

object.description: Undead and Ethereal creatures must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test each round or become Stunned. Spirits with 3 Stunned Conditions are freed from the mortal realm.
object.name: Death’s Release

object.description: Lets you telepathically send message to another r Amethyst wizard. Receiver of the message must pass a Challenging (+0) Intuition Test to understand you. It can also be used to read mind of another Amethyst Wizard. If they pass a Challenging (+0) Intelligence Test, they notice what you are doing and can try to block you with an Opposed Willpower Test.
object.name: Telepathy

object.description: Summon a pillar of fire 2 yards in diameter and 2 yards high. For each +2 SL you can increase the diameter by 1 yard and height by 2 yards. Anyone standing where the pillar has appeared receives magic missile hit with Damage +8, 3 Ablaze Conditions,  Prone Condition, and are thrown outside of the storm.
object.name: Flamestorm

object.description: Summon a wild animal to serve as your mount. You temporarily gain the Ride Skill for this animal equal to your Language - Magick Skill.
object.name: Summon Mount

object.description: Create a whirpool (Gentle Rotation) in the target area. Can be overcasted: 5 SL Whirpool, 8 SL Powerful Vortex, 13 A Maelstorm, 21 The Maelstrom.
object.name: Whirlpool

object.description: While the spell is active target ignores all negative mental modifies - from any source.
object.name: Clarity of Thought

object.description: Teleport 1 small object (up to the size of your fist) from your person to your hand.
object.name: Sly Hands

object.description: Your magical abilities cannot be detected. While active you cannot cast any other spells.
object.name: Mundane Aura

object.description: Protects you from any missiles with organic matter (such as arrows).
object.name: Arrow Shield

object.description: Deal magic missile Damage +6 that ignores Toughness Bonus and Armour. Heal 1 Wound for each 2 inflicted Wounds.
object.name: Caress of Laniph

object.description: Targets with Daemonic Trait with WP lower than twice yours WP cannot enter or leave the affected area.
object.name: Octagram

object.description: Can be cast at someone who is channelling a spell. If successful, you can take an Opposed Willpower Test. If you succeed, the spell fails and they suffer a Minor Miscast.
object.name: Disrupt Magic

object.description: Learning XP: 250. Creates a Familiar. It can have extra traits for the cost of additional CN.
object.name: Create Familiar

object.description: Learning XP: 400. Removes Curse from the item (both boon and bane). The item retains Magical Quality.
object.name: Remove Curse

object.description: You illuminate inside of a building with daylight. Daemons and Undead must pass Challenging (+0) Willpower Test to enter the building. It they enter, they suffer Casting SL Damage that ignores Toughness Bonus and Armour.
object.name: Illuminate the Edifice

object.description: Changes the composition of a metal weapon making it worse. While the spell lasts, all Qualities are disabled and it gets -1 SL to Tests to this with it. Flaws Dangerous fumbles on an 8, 9, or doubles, Reload time is doubled, Slow provides +2 SL to defenders. Magical weapons are unaffected. However if you get +4 SL, their enchantments are temporarily negated.
object.name: Fault of Form

object.description: You surround yourself with a sphere of blades. Anyone engaged in Melee with you takes 3 hits of 8 Damage to random location every round during their turn. Cannot be dodged or parried. Special rules apply to enemies using long weapons.
object.name: Azure Blades

object.description: Invoke horn blast affecting all in range. Friendly targets +2 SL bonus on Cool and Leadership Tests. Enemies get -2 SL on same tests and must pass Fear (1) Test. Neutral targets are unaffected.
object.name: Horn of Andar

object.description: You grant supernatural speed to yourself or another target, allowing them to move 100 yards and take an action in the next round. If killed while under the spell's effect, the target can take an immediate bonus action before death.
object.name: Speed of Lykos

object.description: Causes a flame to mesmerise 1 random observer that must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or receive 3 Stunned Conditions. With +2 SL you may enchant a bigger fire that affects 2 observers, and with +4 SL you can enchant a massive fire that affects all observers.
object.name: Captivating Flame

object.description: Summons a magic sword that hovers in front of you. For every +2 SL you can summon additional sword up to 6 in total. You can spend you action directing the swords withing line of sight. Any single target can only be attacked by a 1 sword. The swords posses Fly (20) Creature, WS 60, and deal 8 Damage before returning quickly to you.
object.name: Sanguine Swords

object.description: You consume a heart to give target +2 SB when determining Damage. When the spell ends, the target has to have a large meal or suffer a Fatigued Condition. Unwilling targets may try to oppose this spell with Difficult (+20) Cool Test.
object.name: Bullgorger

object.description: Transform a stick into a dagger. It counts as Magical. Used against enemies with Ethereal or Corrupted Traits, it has SB + 8 instead of regular SB + 2. After the spell duration ends, you can keep the dagger by passing a Challenging (+0) Channelling Test every round.
object.name: Dagger of the Art

object.description: Fingernails on your hands and feet become claws, allowing you to climb if you are barefoot and without gloves. Gain Scale Sheer Surface Talent.
object.name: Climb

object.description: Gain a temporary mutation. Roll 1d10: 1: Animalistic Legs (+1 Movement), 2: Beaked Face (Bite +3 Trait), 3: Claws (Claw +3 Trait), 4: Fur (Armour 1 on all locations), 5: Horns (Horns +4 Trait), 6: Tail (Tail-lash +3 Trait), 7: Webbed Feet (Amphibious Trait), 8: Wings (Flight 60 Trait), 9-10: Roll twice.
object.name: Gift of the Beast

object.description: Heal 1d10 Wounds and remove all Bleeding Conditions. If the target does not have Arcane Magic - Fire Talent, they must pass a Challenging(+0) Cool Test or scream in agony. If they fail by 6 SL, they gain Unconscious Condition and are permanently scarred.
object.name: Cauterise

object.description: Bolt is a magic missile (Damage +4).
object.name: Bolt

object.description: The target does not have to eat or drink for the duration of the spell.
object.name: Fat of the Land

object.description: Target receives 1 Stunned Condition.
object.name: Shock

object.description: Target must have Daemonic Trait and WP lower than yours. Target loses WP Bonus Wounds that ignore Toughness Bonus and Armor. Increase one of your characteristics by +10 for the duration of the spell.
object.name: Destroy Lesser Daemon

object.description: Gain +20 to Intelligence and Initiative.
object.name: Speed of Thought

object.description: Cover earth with tangled brambles. Anyone trying to go through it has to attempt a Hard (-20) Agility Test. If failed, they gain 1 Bleeding and 1 Entangled (with Strength equal to your WP). Conditions
object.name: Forest of Thorns

object.description: Learning XP: 600. If the ritual takes place at a Leyline Junction or Arcane Fulcrum, the CN is 16. Binds a minor spirit within a Power Stone.
object.name: Bind Spirit Within Power Stone

object.description: All characters and surfaces in the affected area become completely fire resistant and any fires are immediately extinguished.
object.name: Vaunted Transmogrification of Colchis

object.description: A crystal disc appears and follows you around. When you look through it, you are able to see objects and creatures up to 3 miles away clearly. Gives a +2 bonus to any Perception Tests that involve long distances and eliminates penalties for clouds and fog. If you use it to look at stars, receive a +2 bonus on your next Navigation Test.
object.name: Lens on the Sky

object.description: Shoot frigid Azyr from your hand in a chosen direction, hitting all targets within range for 12 damage (ignores Armour but not Toughness Bonus) and forcing them to roll a Hard (-20) Endurance test or suffer first stage of Cold Exposure.
object.name: Mistral From the Stratosphere

object.description: Clean a glass object to make it spotless. With +2 SL, if the object is a lens or widow, it improves Lore (Astronomy) observation by +20. With +4 SL, it enhances visual Perception Tests using Second Sight Talent by +20.
object.name: Polish and Glean

object.description: Your body emits bolts of lightning equal to 2x your I Bonus. Each bolt is a magic missile with +6 Damage that you can direct at separate targets in front of you. You are immediately receive a Stunned Condition and anyone who see you without Arcane Lore - Heavens Talent must Test against a Fear (1). A safer variant calls down I Bonus lightning bolts within a target area of 2x your WP Bonus yards, without stunning or causing fear.
object.name: Storm of Shemtek
object.target: 2 x Initiative Bonus or Initiative Bonus

object.description: Friendly targets become immune to Fear and Terror is treated as Fear instead for the duration of the spell. All Psychology effects caused by grief are permanently removed. If cast on enemies, if they fail a Challenging (+0) Cool Test, they cannot flee combat.
object.name: Acceptance of Fate

object.description: Summon a swirling ball of dust. Affected targets are dealt 8 Damage ignoring Armour and start to Suffocate until they leave the cloud. With +4 SL, you summon Purple Sun of Xereus at the centre of the cloud. It causes Fear (2) and anything that touches it must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or die instantly.
object.name: Ashes and Dust

object.description:
Command creatures with Undead and Ethereal Traits. Chose 1 of the 2 effects: 
Command all targets that fail Opposed Willpower Test.
Summon SL number of Ghosts. They are not under you command but you can subdue them by casting this spell again.
object.name: Compel Spirits

object.description: Empower a forge. All Trade - Smith Tests gain + 1 SL.
object.name: Forge of Tarnus

object.description: Summon a minor fire elemental to defend your camp. The elemental has Movement 3, WS equal to your WP, Fear (1) Trait, and attacks at Damage +6. Whenever its attack causes damage, the opponent gets 1 Ablaze Condition. It must stay within 12 yards from the fire and can be destroyed by extinguishing it with a pint of water.
object.name: Kindred of the Hearth

object.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Trolls. If any Trolls come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
object.name: Fellstave - Trolls

object.description: Cover ship with seaweed. It suffers -2 to Movement and and adjusts its Manoeuvre Characteristic by -3 SL.
object.name: Living Mire

object.description: Put the target to sleep.
object.name: Sleep

object.description: Gain Arboreal, Armour (2), Belligerent, Big, Bite (Strength Bonus +1), Fear (1), Fury, Magical, Weapon (SB+2) Creature Traits. While the spell is active you cannot use any Language or Lore Skills.
object.name: Wyssan's Wildform

object.description: Target an item made of metal. You can add 1 Quality or remove 1 Flaw. For each +2 SL you can add/remove 1 extra Quality/Flaw.
object.name: Forge of Chamon

object.description: The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Dex Test or they immediately drop the object they are holding. For every +2 SL add -10 penalty to the Test.
object.name: Drop

object.description: Learning XP: 500. The bloody totem takes on the form of an Incarnate Elemental of Beasts.
object.name: Conjuration of the Bloody Hidesman

object.description: The ground forms a hill 20 yards in diameter and 5 yards tall. Characters in the affected area have to take a a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test. They take 20 Damage to a random body location if they fail and 10 Damage if they pass. The hill is permanent.
object.name: Assault of Stone

object.description: Grant you insight about the target. You know the creature or object as if you were studying it for a day. For every +2 SL learn a new detail. If casted on a magical object that you are touching, it has the same effect as Detect Artefact Talent.
object.name: Breach the Unknown

object.description: Temporarily reanimate a recently deceased (within last hour) creature. It can't speak and has its maximum Wounds, and obeys simple commands. It does not count as Undead.
object.name: Jade Casket

object.description: A misty spiral staircase lifts you up WP yards. The height can be increased by additional WP yards for every +2 SL. While above you gain 3 AP to all locations.
object.name: Spiral Stair

object.description: Brings back targets killed within the last minute. They have to take Test for Moderate Exposure to Corruption. Cannot heal critical Wounds, lost limbs, or bring back decapitated bodies.
object.name: Verdant Apotheosis

object.description: Target plant instantly grows to its maximum height. For +2/4/6 SL and extra 1/2/3 rounds of concentration casting the spell, you can double/triple/quadruple the maximum height.
object.name: Vital Growth

object.description: Open a dark pit in the ground. Targets near the pit must pass a (+0) Dodge Test or fall in. The pit closes when the spell ends, causing 20 damage and burying those inside alive causing Suffocation.
object.name: Pit of Tarnus

object.description:
Causes the targets to laugh hysterically. Each round they must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or suffer their own S Bonus + 6 Damage (50% chance on head, 50% on body) and receive Stunned Condition. For every +2 SL one you may surround 1 target with a purple fog. If they fail a a Challenging (+0) Willpower
Test, the fog starts Suffocating them for the duration for the spell.
object.name: Fate of Bjuna

object.description: Set an object or a person on fire. The target receives 2 Ablaze Conditions. If they already have Ablaze Condition, you can distribute 3 Ablaze Conditions to others withing 2 yards of the target instead.
object.name: Ignite

object.description: Create a blazing storm that deals 8 + SL Damage per round to all targets in AoE. Every round they must pass a Challenging (+0) Athletics Test or receive Prone Condition. Flammable objects have 25% chance to ignite each round.
object.name: Ygethmor's Flaming Blizzard

object.description: You crunch bones and deal magic missile +4 Damage that ignores AP. If it causes Critical Wound, add +20 to critical table roll.
object.name: Bonecrusher

object.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Ogres. If any Ogres come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
object.name: Fellstave - Ogres

object.description: You cast this spell on something that belongs to the target. The object causes the target to become obsessed with something that depends on the individual and your Lore. Every hour the target must pass a an Average (+20) Endurance Test every hour, or succumb to their obsession.
object.name: Obsession

object.description: Gain a Fortune point (for the duration of the spell) for every positive SL. If the casting fails, gain 1 Corruption point for every negative SL.
object.name: Master of Fortune

object.description: The target must pass a WP Test or gains one Stunned Condition.
object.name: Befuddle

object.description: Add +10 to your Int or Fel characteristics.
object.name: Blessing of Slaanesh

object.description: You ignore Fatigued conditions for as long as you do something you enjoy. When you stop, the conditions return and you lose 1 Wound ignoring your TB and armour.
object.name: Endure Excess

object.description: You may make one Called Shot against the target without taking the usual -20 penalty.
object.name: Leer

object.description: Imbue an object with essence of desire. Anyone who likes that sort of objects with find this one particularly desirable.
object.name: Lure

object.description: Your body and clothing become instantly clean. Anyone who pays close attention will notice that details that slightly off. For example, on closer look, your hair looks greasy.
object.name: Preen

object.description: You look your target in the eye. If you pass an opposed Intuition/Cool Test, you learn about 1 of target's vices.
object.name: Sense Vice

object.description: Reduce target's I to 10. Target's movement becomes random and they have to pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test to perform any Action.
object.name: Acquiescence

object.description: Reduce I of all targets to 10. Their movement becomes random and they have to pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test to perform any Action.
object.name: Aura of Acquiescence

object.description: Targets gains 1 Entangled Condition for each SL.
object.name: Bonds of Slaanesh

object.description: The target gains a bonus to one Test equal to your WP, after which the effect ends.
object.name: Breath of Inspiration

object.description: Deal magic missile with Damage +6. If it hits the head location, you may inflict Entangled Condition using your WP instead of S for purposes of the Opposed Test. It lasts WP bonus Rounds.
object.name: Blissful Throes

object.description: All targets receive Damage +3 hit per SL that ignores Armour.
object.name: Cacophonic Caress

object.description: Make an Extended Opposed Cool Test, with 6 required SLs. The winner can hear loser's current Ambition. They also have to pass a Cool Test or gain 1 Corruption point.
object.name: Careless Whispers

object.description: The targets rolls once on the Physical or Mental Corruption Tables for each SL.
object.name: Chaos Spawn

object.description: The targets rolls on the Head Critical Wounds table. The results is as rolled but there are no broken bones.
object.name: Cursed Caress

object.description: Deal magic missile with a Damage of +3 that ignores Armour.
object.name: Cutting Wit
