object.description: Remove all Broken Conditions from the target. It cannot gain new ones for the duration of the spell.
object.name: Delicious Excruciation

object.description: Causes 1 target to sprout horrible, uncontrollable growths. The growths are permanent. When the spell is cast and at the beginning of each round, the target can attempt a Hard (-20) Cool Test to resist the spell. If failed, roll on table on p. 38 to determine effects of the curse during that round.
object.name: Fleshy Curse

object.description: Make an Extended Opposed Cool Test, with 6 required SLs. If you win you get full control of target's body. When the spell ends, the target is aware they have been controlled and if they pass a Challenging (+0) Intuition Test, they can tell who controlled them.
object.name: Flesh Puppet

object.description: The target gains the Painless Creature Trait. If they suffer a Critical Wound, they must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or they drop their weapon and stand helplessly.
object.name: From Pain, Pleasure

object.description: Deal Damage +5 hit. The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test (the difficulty increases by 1 step per SL) or gain a Stunned Condition.
object.name: Lash of Slaanesh

object.description: Slaanesh bestows his gift on you. To determine the gift, roll 1d10 on table on p. 39.
object.name: Gift of Slaanesh

object.description: All affected targets enter the Frenzy state. They attack nearest creature.
object.name: Luxurious Torment

object.description: Remove all Conditions from the target. All their visible wounds are masked for the duration of the spell. They also benefit from +10 to all Fel Tests.
object.name: Mask of Desire

object.description: All targets make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test. If they fail, all they can do is dance lewdly. If attacked, they are Surprised for the first round of combat.
object.name: Pavane of Slaanesh

object.description: You and your allies gain Distracting Creature Trait.
object.name: Phantasmagoria

object.description: Every hour, the target must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or be overcome by pleasure. On the first failure, they gain 1 Fatigued Condition. On every next failure, they gain 1 Blinded and 1 Deafened Conditions. If the sum of Blinded and Deafened Conditions is equal or greater than their Initiative Bonus, they gain Unconscious Condition. When the spell ends, all Conditions other than the Fatigued Condition are removed.
object.name: Succubus's Caress

object.description: Summon a Daemonette that can appear anywhere within spell's range. It is not under your control, but can be bargained with.
object.name: Summon Daemonette

object.description: Summon a number of Daemonettes equal to your WP Bonus. They can appear anywhere within spell's range. They are not under your control, but can be bargained with.
object.name: Summon Daemonette Pack

object.description: Create an illusion of your enemy's deepest desire. Each Round, all enemies that can see it, must pass a Challenging (+0) WP Test or spend entire Round moving towards it. Those who reach it, must pass a Challenging (+0) WP Test every Round. If they fail, they spend the Round trying to grasp the illusion.
object.name: Titillating Delusions

object.description: You weave subtle webs and tie them to an object. You become aware of any creature of size Small or larger that gets within WP Bonus Yards of the object.
object.name: Snitch

object.description: Gain 1 Fortune point for the duration of the spell. You can only gain the extra point once every 13 hours.
object.name: Favour of the Horned Rat

object.description: Create a small blob of green glowing fire. It burns for 1 hour and gives as much light as a torch. You can throw at an enemy in which case you use Ranged (Throwing) Skill and it does SB + WPB Damage.
object.name: Ghostly Flame

object.description: The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gets an ugly weeping sore on their head that reduces all Fellowship Tests by -10.
object.name: Mark of the Horned Rat

object.description: Summon a rat that will obey all your commands.
object.name: Rat Thrall

object.description:
The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance
Test or they get -20 to all Tests to resist disease. Targets with Resistance - Disease may use it to resist this spell.
object.name: Vector

object.description: All creatures in the AoE have to pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or be transformed into Skaven of size appropriate their size.
object.name: Curse of the Horned Rat

object.description: Target Skaven becomes subject to Frenzy. Unwilling Skavens may take a Challenging (+0) Cool Test to resist the spell. If they do, they lose 1 Wound as they bite their own body to distract themselves.
object.name: Death Frenzy

object.description: Targets become subjects to Terror (1) effect or Terror (2) for Skaven.
object.name: Musk of Terror

object.description: Teleport yourself and 1 other creature (of Average size or smaller) to any location you can see within WP yards. Unwilling targets may try to avoid being touched and/or change destination by +SL yards by passing a Difficult (-10) Cool Test.
object.name: Skitterleap

object.description: Summon a swarm of rats that you can control for Willpower Bonus rounds. After that, you lose control of them and they move and attack at random. After the spell ends, the rats disperse.
object.name: Vermintide

object.description: Create a 1-yard wide crack in the ground that extends Willpower yards  in a straight line in any direction within your line of sight.
object.name: Crack’s Call

object.description: Cast a magic missile with a Damage of +4. Struck enemy must make a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain 1 Stunned Condition for each SL.
object.name: Crackling Doom

object.description: Cast a magic missile with a Damage of +4 that ignores armour and Toughness Bonus.
object.name: Flensing Ruin

object.description: Enemies cannot fly in the affected area and all ranged attacks in or out of it suffer a -10 penalty. Allies are not affected.
object.name: Howling Warpgale

object.description: Cast a magic missile with a Damage of +10. Damaged enemies also gain 1 Ablaze Condition and suffer from Minor Exposure to Corruption.
object.name: Scorch

object.description: Cast a magic missile with a Damage of +11. If the hit location is covered with metal armour, ignore AP and instead add it to the Damage. In case of Critical Success you also take a Damage +1 hit.
object.name: Warp Lightning

object.description: Gain +5 AP to all hit locations. Anyone that touches you takes a hit with Damage equal to 5 + your WP Bonus to the hit location used to touch you. This hit ignores AP from metal armour.
object.name: Warp Shield

object.description: Each round, all creatures in the AoE  take Damage +10 hit to the highest point of their body. This hit ignores AP from metal armour. Every round the caster may move the AoE by Willpower yards.
object.name: Warp Storm

object.description: Anyone within the AoE must pass a a Difficult (-10) Endurance Test or suffer a hit with Damage equal to your WP Bonus. This Damage ignores Toughness Bonus and AP. For each additional +2 SL, you can extend AoE by 1 yard.
object.name: Pestilent Breath

object.description: Create a pustule on your body. You can cut and drain it (deals 1 Wound) and coat a weapon with the fluid. If the coated weapon deals at least 1 Wound, the victim has to pass a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or suffer extra Wounds equal to your Willpower Bonus. Once drained, the fluid remains active for Willpower Bonus hours.
object.name: Poisonous Pustule

object.description: You can touch 1 weapon or 3 ammunition items.  The touched item causes a Poisoned Condition in addition to its normal damage.
object.name: Bless with Filth

object.description: Every character in the AoE counts as possessing the Infected Creature Trait.
object.name: Bless with Filth - v2

object.description: Every creature in the AoE must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain 1 Poisoned Condition. Your attacks gain Infected Creature Trait for the next  WP Bonus rounds.
object.name: Cloud of Corruption

object.description: You taint a piece of food or clothing with Black Plague.
object.name: Mantle of Contagion

object.description: You cause rot and decay in all food in the AoE. Anyone who eats it will suffer from Galloping Trots.
object.name: Putrefy

object.description: Starting from the next round, all creatures must pass a Difficult (-10) Toughness every round or loose 3 Wounds ignoring AP and T Bonus. Anyone who loses 6 or more Wounds, gains Unconscious Condition. As an action, you can move AoE within Willpower yards of your location.
object.name: Toxic Rain

object.description: Create a swarm of flies that surrounds you. Any other creature in the AoE receives a -20 penalty to all Tests. In addition, anyone trying to attack you using ranged skill receives -20 penalty.
object.name: Veil of Flies

object.description: Every Wound target receives counts as Minor Infection. All Endurance Tests to avoid Festering Wounds suffer a -10 penalty for each SL. Every time they receive Bleeding Condition, they receive 1 extra Bleeding Condition.
object.name: Weeping Wound

object.description: If the target fails Challenging (+0) Endurance Test, they lose 1 point of T for each SL. Creatures who lose all points are killed. Victims who survive regain 1 point per day of complete rest and additional 1d10 points if treated with healing capable of removing Critical Wounds.
object.name: Wither

object.description: Increase your Movement by WP Bonus. For every +2 SL, your Movement increases by an extra point.
object.name: Swiftscamper

object.description: Gain +1 AP to all locations and +20 to all Stealth Tests in dim light.
object.name: Armour of Darkness

object.description: Every round, you can move the whirlwind by up 10 yards without sacrificing an Action. Targets affected by the Black Whirlwind have to pass an a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or suffer a -20 penalty on all WS, BS, and Ag, and Perception (involving eyesight) Tests for 1d10 minutes.
object.name: Black Whirlwind

object.description: You can walk over water or similar as if it was solid ground. In addition, you don't leave tracks when moving over soft surface such as mud or snow.
object.name: Buoyant Passage

object.description: Everyone in the AoE must make a successful Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain 1 Stunned and 1 Blinded Conditions for each level of failure. On a critical failure, they gain extra Stunned Condition. Does not affect anyone with Arcane Magic - Stealth Talent.
object.name: Flash-Bang

object.description: Your fur changed colour to match your surroundings. When perfectly still, you gain a +40 bonus to all Stealth Tests.
object.name: Pelt of the Assassin

object.description: Gain Wallcrawler Creature Trait.
object.name: Stickypaws

object.description: If the target dies while under the effects of Traceless Demise, its body and all equipment dissolve into black slime.
object.name: Traceless Demise

object.description: Enchant a number of Throwing Stars equal to your WP Bonus. Anyone hit by such star, must pass a Hard (-20) Toughness Test or suffer Wounds equal to your WP Bonus that ignores AP and T Bonus.
object.name: Warp Star Infusion

object.description: Gain Ethereal Trait.
object.name: Spirit Walk

object.description: You trick the target into thinking that you speak in regular manner.
object.name: Cunnin' Words

object.description: The targets gains 1 + SL  Fatigued Conditions.
object.name: Gork'll Fix It

object.description: Anyone in the AoE without Night Vision or Dark vision gains Blinded Condition. if they want to move, they must pass a Challenging (+0) Perception Test or gain Prone Condition.
object.name: Night Shroud

object.description: All hits made targets of this spell gain Impale and Penetrating Qualities.
object.name: Sneaky Stabbin'
object.target: Orc, Goblin, Snotling, and Hobgoblin allies within Range

object.description: All enemies in the AoE are hit with magic missile with Damage +4. Anyone who takes damage, has to make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain a Stunned Condition.
object.name: Vindictive Glare

object.description:
You cause creature or object to age and decay rapidly. A living creature must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness
Test or ages 2d10 years and permanently loses –1d10 from their WS, BS, S, T Ag, and Dex.
object.name: Reveal the Inner Beauty

object.description: Learning XP: 150. Bonds with Animal Familiar.
object.name: Spirit-Bonding Ritual

object.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell. All warm-blooded creatures are hit with +2 Damage at the end of each round and must make an Average (+20) Endurance Test or gain  Blinded and Fatigued Conditions.
object.name: A Bite of Midges

object.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell. Target gains one Entangled Condition with a Strength equal to your Int, plus 1 extra Entangled Condition for each + 2 SL. Each round, the target has to pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or gain a Fatigued Condition. The spell lasts until all Entangled Conditions are removed.
object.name: Despondent Slough

object.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell. Targets have to pass Easy (+40) Endurance Test or gain a Fatigued Condition. All Tests to shoot blackpowder weapons, cast spells from the Lore of Fire, or enter Frenzy suffer -2 SL.
object.name: Inculcate Mizzle

object.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell.Everyone in the affected area that do not have Arcane Magic (Shadows) Talent gains +1 Blinded, Deafened, and Fatigued Conditions which stay for the whole duration of the spell. Affected targets that try to move have to pass a Challenging (+0) Perception Test or receive Prone Condition.
object.name: Mystic Mist

object.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell. Stand one foot in water and the other on dry land. The edge of the marsh creeps outward across the Area of Effect.
object.name: O Mere Be More

object.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell. Target suffers from -3 SL to any Navigation Tests in the swamp area.
object.name: Turned Around

object.description: Target recovers WP Bonus of Wounds and gains Fear 1 Creature Trait. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Apotheosis

object.description: Target suffers 1 Damage to the body for every 2 Armour Points worn. This Damage ignores APs. If you pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test, 1 randomly selected magic item in target's possession is destroyed. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Arcane Unforging

object.description: Dispels all persistent spells in the AoE. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Drain Magic

object.description: You make a mountain or hill shake. Everyone who is there has to pass a Very Hard (-30) Athletics Test at the start of their Round. If they fail, they gain a Prone Condition and cannot move or take any action. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Uproot the Mountains

object.description: Targets gain Ethereal Creature Trait and their Movement Points are doubled. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Walk Between Worlds

object.description:
Anyone on the leyline must pass a
Hard (-20) Endurance Test or suffer 15 Damage that ignores APs. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Earth Line

object.description: Completely destroy 1 building. Anyone inside must pass a  Hard (-20) Dodge Test or suffers 20 Damage and is buried alive. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Ruination of Cities

object.description:
Deal Int Bonus + 6 Damage to all targets in the AoE. This damage ignores APs. Deal extra 6 Damage to anyone with Daemonic or Undead Traits. Targets must pass an Average (+20)
Int Test or gain a Stunned Condition. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Mental Blast

object.description: Give an allied Orc, Goblin, or Hobgoblin 1+SL Advantage points. All points maybe be given to a single target or distributed to many targets.
object.name: Bash 'Em Lads!

object.description: Magic Missile with a Damage of +1 that always hits head location. If the target has Aethyric Attunement or Second Sight Talents, the damage is +6 instead.
object.name: 'Eadbutt!

object.description: You drop anything you were holding and can only attack with your fists. You gain Melee - Brawling 55 and Weapon - Fists +9.
object.name: Fists of Gork

object.description: For each SL, you may give 1 allied Orc or Goblin Ward 10 Creature Trait. If they already have Ward x, this spell makes it Ward x-1. This cannot reduce Ward below 7.
object.name: Mork Save Us!

object.description: Summon a fog that reduces visibility to 10 yards. The fog is not magical and cannot be Dispelled.
object.name: Shroud of Fog

object.description: Target suffers a -10 to all Tests, and its Movement is halved.
object.name: Itchy Nuisance

object.description: All targets gain +1 Advantage and their weapons gain the Penetrating Quality for as long as they have Advantage.
object.name: Sneaky Stabbin' - v2

object.description: Creates a small magical flame that cannot be extinguished and does not need fuel.
object.name: Ceaseless Flame

object.description: Creates an area of warmth in an cold environment. Any Outdoor Survival Tests to make camp inside the area, can be no worse than Average (+20).
object.name: Comfort

object.description: Instantly cooks a meat, pot of stew or similar. If cast on a living creature, it's a magic missile dealing +3 Damage, which also inflicts one Stunned Condition on anything that can feel pain. If the location is an arm, the target has to pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or drop whatever they are holding.
object.name: Flashcook

object.description: During the duration of this spell you can communicate with any birds, but you cannot communicate in any other language (you can only make bird sounds).
object.name: Birdspeech

object.description: You learn about the future weather in your location for the rest of the day and tomorrow. With +2SL you learn the weather for the following weak, with +4SL for the following month, and with +6SL for the rest of the season.
object.name: Weathervane

object.description: Summon a gale for WP Bonus Rounds. It extinguishes all torches and fires, and anything with Ablaze Conditions loses 1 Condition per Round. Targets must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or are sent flying 1d10 yards backwards and gain 1 Prone Condition. Alternatively summon a gentler wind for WP Bonus hours. It has no dramatic effect but can, for example, fill the sail for the duration of this spell.
object.name: Gale

object.description: Non-metal object behaves as if it was metal but its appearance does not change. The item gains all the usual Qualities and Flaws of a typical metal object of that sort. At the end of the spell roll 1d10. 1: the item is destroyed; 2-3: the item becomes degraded and torn; 4-10: no effect. Cannot be cast on already enchanted items.
object.name: Rigor of Steel

object.description: You can sense all metal within range of the spell as long as it is not hidden behind other metal. You can tell metal type, rough shape and precise location. For more details you must pass Challenging (+0) Perception Test.
object.name: Sense Metal

object.description: You learn the history of an metal object. For example when it was forged, any significant moments in its existence, and how it used during during the last day.
object.name: Tale of Metal

object.description: Heal WP Bonus +SL Wounds of any beast. Gain +20 to Charm Animal Tests of the healed beast.
object.name: Beast Made Well

object.description: Mark a beast. Other beasts will avoid it unless attacked. Anyone that passes a a Hard (-20) Intuition Test senses that this creature is protected and should not be harmed. Anyone who injures it suffers -10 Fel for the duration of this spell. In addition, other beasts of the same species will either avoid the abuser or be aggressive towards them.
object.name: Cruelty's Deserts

object.description: Target beast gains one of the following Creature Traits: Arboreal, Armour (2), Belligerent, Big, Bite (Strength Bonus +1), Clever, Fast, Fear (10), Fury, Magical, or Weapon (Strength Bonus +2). For each +SL, you may choose one more Trait.
object.name: Wyssan's Ally

object.description: You make a call to a specific species of beasts. The call conveys a simple message, for example "food here".
object.name: Wildercall

object.description: Cast on any material that could normally be fermented or beneficially aged, this spell brings it to the peak of suitability for consumption. To create high quality version, you must pass an appropriate Trade Test as well.
object.name: Ferment

object.description: You can deposit a small creature or an object (1 Enc) into the foliage of any tree. The target vanishes into another realm of existence. You can then later cast this spell again on any other tree of the same species to retrieve the object. Creatures cannot be retrieved. The object can have +1 Enc for each SL.
object.name: Timbervault

object.description: Let's you track any creature in natural, rural environment. Make a  Track Test with +2SL Bonus. If succeeded, you can track any creature that has passed withing WP Bonus yards. The spell lasts as long as you are tracking one single set of tracks. You lose the trail when the creature enters urban environment or crosses an artificial road.
object.name: Track's Tale Told

object.description: Restores the object to its original pristine state. If cast on a living being, it restores its clothing and cleans it. Leaving creatures suffer 1 Wound for each Corruption point they posses.
object.name: Cleansing Glow

object.description: Make an object disgusting for any creature the Daemonic or Undead Traits, or anyone with 3 or more Corruption points. They need to pass an opposed Cool Test resisted by the observer's Intuition or be visibly repulsed.
object.name: Disgust

object.description:
Makes a source of light much stronger than it normally is. If cast in a dark environment, on the first round, anyone without Arcane
Magic - Light Talent looking at the source has to pass a Challenging (+0) Initiative Test to close their eyes, or receive a Blinded Condition.
object.name: Illuminate

object.description: Can be cast of a living creature or one that has just died. For the duration of the spell the creature stays alive as long as they take no further damage. Stops damage from Bleeding Conditions.
object.name: Stay Death's Hand

object.description: The target can sense Shyish Wind of Magic and see spirits. If the have not been warned about the effects of the spell, they must make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain one Broken Condition.
object.name: Deathsight

object.description: Can target a large food container, vehicle, or building. Prevents the perishables form getting spoiled and other objects are protected from wear and tear and environmental damage.
object.name: Preservation

object.description: Can target object of up to 70 Enc. This spell makes it look either immensely valuable or completely worthless. Anyone with  Second Sight Talent who inspects the object, must pass a Hard (-20) Intuition Test to detect it has been enchanted.
object.name: Shadows of Splendour

object.description: You can conceal your real action with a fake action. For example, you might look like you are reading a book while in reality you are putting it in your bag. This spell does not change your location or masks/create new sounds. People interacting with you make Challenging (+0) Intuition Test to realise that something unnatural is happening.
object.name: Cloak Activity

object.description: You plunge the area in darkness. It's impossible to see through it and anything that steps out of it receives 3 Blinded Conditions.
object.name: Pall of Darkness

object.description: Create atmosphere of mistrust and hatred. Everyone in AoE suffers -10 to all Fellowship Tests and any Prejudice Psychology becomes Hatred instead.
object.name: Badwill

object.description: Reduce the healing time for a Broken Bone injury by 1d10 days, plus an additional 1d10 days for each +SL.
object.name: Bonesetter

object.description: Cleanses the target of most forms of harmful magic.
object.name: Cleanslate

object.description: Ensure that the next harvest will be at least average regardless of circumstances. They usual pay for this is 1/20 of the yield.
object.name: Fertilise

object.description: Allows you to track an item that binds a ghost to the mortal realm. You need to make an extended Difficult (-10) Navigate Test to follow the trail, with each Test requiring an hour, and a total of between 5 and 15 SL being required to succeed.
object.name: Fetterfetch

object.description: Creates a spirit repelling mixture. Smearing in on an entrance bars spirits from entering unless they pass a Hard (-20) Willpower. When used on weapon, the weapon counts as magic for the purpose of harming ghosts and undead. If used against undead that can be damaged with normal weapons, this mixture gives the weapon Damaging Quality. The effect ends immediately if the weapon gets in contact with blood.
object.name: Geistbane

object.description: Creates a fire that cannot be extinguished. This fire grants +20 to all Endurance Tests to resist cold weather. Spoiled or poisoned food cooked over this fire becomes safe to eat.
object.name: Kindle

object.description: Prepare a 1 + SL doses of powder. This powder has to be consumed (usually in a drink) by target(s) before the spell duration expires. It allows you yo control their dream next time they sleep.
object.name: Onerion

object.description: Has to be cast on a container of strong alcohol. Anyone who consumes it, automatically passes the first Fear Test they need to take.
object.name: Stout Spirit

object.description: Must be cast on a bowl of broth. After consuming it, the target ignores all Fatigued Conditions gained by tiredness for the duration of the spell.
object.name: Trankraft

object.description:
Enchant a single item of jewellery. It brings bad luck to its wearer. The wearer receives -10 to all Gamble Tests, -10 to Tests to resist any
kind of harmful magic, and +20 on the severity rolls for all Critical Wounds.
object.name: Woecharm

object.description: Select a spirit. The  spirit will perform one task requested by you. It will demand something in return.
object.name: Godspakt

object.description:
You make a creature with Daemonic or Undead Trait to lose interest in you. If the creature's WP is equal of higher than yours you must win Opposed Cool Test for the spell to work, otherwise it works automatically.
The creature chooses nearest viable target instead, but you might direct it to a specific target if you have present the creature with a memento of that person.
object.name: Banishment of Böl

object.description: You take a stone from a crumbling structure. You can throw it as Rock or used as Improvised Weapon. If it inflicts at least one Wound, that target must pass a Difficult (-10) Endurance Test, or suffer a Broken Bone (Minor). The spell expires after inflicting one Broken Bone.
object.name: Bonesnapper

object.description: Target loses 1 + SL Bleeding Conditions. For each one you may inflict a Fatigued Condition. If you do, the target must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain Unconscious Condition.
object.name: Congeal

object.description: Your target must make a Hard (-20) Cool Test. If they fail, you may choose the next words they will speak. You cannot force them to talk, but when they do chose to talk they will say what you want. The effect lasts for 1 sentence.
object.name: Curse of the Treacherous Tongue

object.description: The target looses 1 Fortune point. They must make a Hard (-20) Endurance Test. If they fail, they cannot gain any new Fortune points until the spell’s duration has passed.
object.name: Fatethief

object.description: With a sample of target's blood (no older than 1 day) you can track them for the duration of the spell.
object.name: Lodestone

object.description:
Opens a portal in a mirror or similar reflective surface. The portal leads to a void. Anyone trapped there must pass Challenging (+0)
Endurance Test each day or vanish forever. A second casting of this spell may open the portal again to bring them back.
object.name: Mirrored Abyss

object.description: For the curse to take effect the victim must fail a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test. If the do, everyone around them feel suspicious about them. The target suffers  -20 to Fellowship based Tests to interact with others. Anyone with Second Sight Talent will see a cloud of Dhar around the cursed target.
object.name: Outcast's Curse

object.description: Agree to a pact with a willing target. From now on, both of you must adhere to the terms as best of your ability. Whoever breaks  terms suffers from the following effects until they make amends. Any loss of Wounds causes a Bleeding Condition. Any time the victim would gain a Fatigued Condition, they gain two instead. The victim must add 40 to the results of any Critical Wound severity test.
object.name: Pactbind

object.description: If the target fail a Hard (-20) Cool Test, they must roll for a Critical Wound even though they do not take any damage. For the duration of the spell they feel all effects of the wound.
object.name: Painjar

object.description:
You walk a path and make it impossible for anyone
else to follow. For the duration of the spell, the path is incomprehensible to anyone else.
object.name: Wayward Path

object.description: Summon a daemon. After successful casting, make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test, roll 1d10 and add both numbers. -5 or worse: A greater daemon's hand drags you into its realm. -4 to -0: A hostile Lesser Daemon or a powerful spirit. 0 to 4: A neutral Lesser Daemon or a powerful spirit. 5 to 9: A favourable Lesser Daemon or a powerful spirit. 10 or better: A Greater Daemon with an interest in speaking with you.
object.name: Nameless Summons

object.description: The Butcher and all friendly Ogres in AoE gain Hatred against a target (or group of targets) the Butcher chose.
object.name: Bilebrew

object.description: Make an Easy (+40) Endurance Test. You heal 1 + SL Wounds. If you fail the Test, gain Bloody Flux.
object.name: Bloodgruel

object.description: All Ogres in AoE ignore any Broken Conditions.
object.name: Get Some Guts

object.description:
You must make a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test. If you fail, lose 1 tooth for every -1 SL. If you pass, you and all friendly Ogres in AoE gain +20 to Endurance
and Cool Tests, and + 1 AP to all Hit Locations.
object.name: Toothcracker

object.description: The target gains Hatred towards all enemies, may ignore all negative effects of Conditions and Diseases, and gain +2 SL to any Toughness based Tests.
object.name: 'Ard as Nails

object.description: Target gains Prone and Stunned Conditions. Also gains 1 Stunned Condition for every +1 SL. If they suffer more Stunned Conditions than their Toughness Bonus, they must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or suffer Critical Hit to the head.
object.name: Brainbursta

object.description: All Orc allies in the AoE gain +2 Advantage for all Melee Tests.
object.name: 'Ere We Go!

object.description: All targets in the AoE suffer 8+SL Damage every Round and must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or receive an Ablaze Condition every Round.
object.name: The Evil Sun

object.description: All targets in the AoE gain Prone Condition. They must make a Difficult (-10) Dodge Test. If they pass, they receive 4 Damage (ignores AP) to random hit location, otherwise they receive 8 Damage.
object.name: Foot of Gork

object.description: Any living creature on a straight line in the direction of the blast is hit by a Damage +4 magic missile. It also damages buildings with 65 or less Toughness.
object.name: Gaze of Mork

object.description: A giant hand scoops 1d10 targets (must be within Willpower Bonus yards of each other) and puts them down somewhere within range. The targets gain +1 Advantage.
object.name: The Hand of Gork

object.description: Target Orc, Hobgoblin, or Goblin gains Ward 10 Creature Trait. If they already have a Ward Trait, it improves by 1. It cannot be improved to 7 or better in this way.
object.name: Mork Save Us!

object.description: All targets in the AoE t gain 1 Advantage for specific use on Melee and Ranged Tests. It also removes any Broken Conditions and gives +2 SL to Cool and Endurance Tests.
object.name: WAAAGH!
object.target: AoE (Willpower yards) all Orcs, Hobgoblins, and Goblins within range

object.description:
Any accompanying Squig, Giant Wolf, Spider, or Snotling will follow the Shaman’s
commands with the discipline of a well-trained dog.
object.name: Behave!

object.description: Enemies in the AoE cannot use their Fortune Points and gain 1 Fatigued Condition.
object.name: Curse of Da Bad Moon

object.description: All allies in the AoE gain Venom Trait with  Challenging (+0) potency. If they already have the Venom Trait, it becomes Difficult (-10) potency.
object.name: Gift of the Spider-God
object.target: Forest Goblins in AoE (Willpower Bonus yards)

object.description: The targets gains 1 Fatigued Condition.
object.name: Gork'll Fix It - v2

object.description: Whenever a friendly Goblin (or Hobgoblin if the Shaman is a Hobgoblin)  in the AoE successfully hits an enemy, it counts as a Critical Hit.
object.name: The Great Green Spite

object.description: Target suffers a -1 SL to all Test. If they are wearing metal armour, the penalty is increased to -2 SL.
object.name: Itchy Nuisance - v2

object.description: A giant hand tries to lift the target. The target must win an Opposed Strength Test against a Strength of 80. If they lose, they suffer 10 Damage to the body location and then dropped from 2d10 yards.
object.name: Mork Wants Ya!

object.description: The Shaman conjures pair of hands that can pickpocket with Sleight of Hand skill of 55. On successful theft, the target may make a Challenging (+0) Perception to see the hands and that they are flying back to the Shaman.
object.name: Nikkit!

object.description: All hits made targets in the AoE gain Impale and Penetrating Qualities.
object.name: Sneaky Stabbin' - v3
object.target: AoE (Willpower Bonus yards) Orcs and Goblins

object.description: All enemies in the AoE are hit with magic missile with Damage +4. Anyone who takes damage, has to make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain Stunned Condition.
object.name: Vindictive Glare - v2

object.description: Rise on Light: Gain Flight (Agility) Creature Trait and 5 Armour Points on all Hit Locations. This magical barrier doesn't stack with worn Armour; use the higher value for each Hit Location. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Coruscation of Finreir

object.description: Warp Air: Shooters can reroll missed missile attacks against affected targets. Applies to magical ammunition and war machines, but not magic missiles. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Curse of Arrow Attraction

object.description: Invokes legendary Elven heroes to guide allies. Targets temporarily gain 3d10 to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, Initiative, or Agility, or Movement increased by 2. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Hand of Glory

object.description: Conjures illusory maze of mist and shadows. Targets must pass Very Hard (-30) Navigation Test or wander randomly. If a target fails 3 Tests and you pass an Average (+20) Leadership Test, you may control directions of targets. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Glamour of Teclis

object.description: Nullifies enemy spellcasting by creating a droning resonance of anti-magic. Target's spells are temporarily negated while weapons and armor function normally. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Deadlock

object.description: Opens paths between worlds for allies. Friendly targets gain the Ethereal Creature Trait and doubled Movement scores. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Walk between Worlds

object.description: Radiates streams of pure Qhaysh to banish evil. Daemonic and Undead creatures suffer magic missile damage +8 (or +15 for Size Large). Creatures with Undead trait suffer double damage. Destroyed Daemons cannot return for 1,001 days. Destroyed Undead can never be resummoned. Additionally, you can make a free Dispelling attempt against every Witchcraft, Daemonology, Necromancy, Dark Magic, or Chaos spell within the Area of Effect Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Greater Banishment

object.description: Summons polychromatic storm of crackling energy. Moves like random vortex spell (see Winds of Magic p .21) but skips steps 1-2. Creatures in Area of Effect suffer magic missile damage +4 and must pass Average Athletics Test. Flying targets suffer damage +5 and penalties to tests. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Tempest

object.description: Creates an invisible floating eyeball that moves at command. Has Perception, Magick language talent, Sight, and Flight 120 trait. Can be destroyed if detected (3 Wounds). If destroyed, caster suffers from Surprised condition. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Invisible Eye

object.description: Summons glittering protective field around allies. Friendly targets gain the Ward 9+ Creature Trait. Each High Magic spell improves the Ward trait by 1. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Shield of Saphery

object.description: Casts streaking lines of white light at foes, banishing souls to afterlife. Deals magic missile damage +6. Slain targets cannot manifest as ghosts or have souls bound into vessels. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Soul Quench

object.description: Summons barrage of fire hitting all creatures in Area of Effect. Magic missile hit with Damage +5 and inflicts Ablaze Condition, which causes damage and Ablaze condition each round. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Fiery Convocation

object.description: Summons invisible spirits to distract a spellcaster. Doubles rolled on Channelling or Casting Tests cause a Miscast regardless of talents or ingredients. Casting Tests cannot cause Criticals and Dispelling fails on if they roll  doubles. Characters with Second Sight can perceive the spirits. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Fortune is Fickle

object.description: Expels magic from the world by conjuring an aethyric vortex. Persistent spells in Area of Effect are immediately dispelled and accumulated magic is lost. Magic items and Hard Creature Traits unaffected. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Drain Magic

object.description: Enhances craftsmanship abilities, making weapons and armor more elegant and less cumbersome. When cast on non-magical weapons or armor being crafted, the item gains the Lightweight quality. A Trade (Smith) Test determines other qualities or flaws.
object.name: Vaul's Grace

object.description: Allows detection of approaching enemies and creatures within Intelligence Bonus yards of a targeted forge or campfire. Targets can be sensed even when hidden, regardless of line of sight or distance from the forge. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Divination of Flames

object.description: Transforms forge energy into a massive explosion that leaves the caster unharmed. Everyone within Willpower Bonus yards takes fire damage in a random Hit Location with Damage +6, ignoring Armor, and receives 2 Ablaze conditions. Requires a Dodge Test or gain a Stunned condition. Everyone within 2 x Willpower Bonus yards suffers a Damage +3 hit and receives 1 Ablaze Condition.
object.name: Vaul's Rage

object.description: Compresses hours of artisanal patience into seconds. When cast on non-magical items being crafted, the SL required for Extended Tests is reduced to a quarter with no impact on the quality of the finished product.
object.name: Patience of Vaul

object.description: Enhances the aesthetic quality of crafted objects. When cast on a non-magical item being crafted, it gives the item Fine Quality. Other qualities or flaws may still be present alongside this enhancement.
object.name: Artist's Touch

object.description: Enables detection of rare minerals needed for magic item creation within a GM-determined range. Helps identify correct locations to dig and generally provides enough materials for items worth about 1d10 Encumbrance of magic items. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Divination of Stones

object.description: Creates a forge chamber with multiple magical defenses. The area receives protective enchantments including a Firewall spell, magical armor protection (Glittering Robe spell), cursed walls that melt objects (Crucible of Chamon spell), and reinforced doors equivalent to gates that can only be damaged by siege weapons. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Fortress of Hotek

object.description: Harnesses ancient crafting techniques to create exceptional items. You can make ithilmar item using a Crafting Endeavour. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Wisdom of the Skysteel

object.description: Invokes Vaul's perfectionism to create flawless magical items. When cast on magical items being crafted, any Flaws, Quirks, or Curses rolled during the crafting process are ignored. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Fires of Perfection

object.description: Conceals a single-masted ship within a dense cloak of sea fog, imposing –3 SL penalty on any attempt to see it. Ships leave a wake that might be noticed with Challenging (+0) Perception Test. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Cloak of Mathlann

object.description: Conjures a powerful wind elemental from ocean currents manifesting as a swirling cyclone propelled by water spirits. The elemental can be controlled to move at high speed while concentrating, otherwise it moves as random vortex spell.
object.name: Spirits of the Waves

object.description: Summons a Merwyrm monster that emerges from the sea. The creature is non-magical and neutral for of casting Fishbonding purposes. The caster does not control it. It returns to the depths when the spell expires. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Call of the Seas

object.description: Creates a magical bond with a non-magical, non-predatory fish. The creature becomes friendly. Hostile creatures become neutral while neutral creatures become friendly and will protect you if possible.
object.name: Fishbonding

object.description: Creates a salt-scented mist that conceals allies, imposing –20 penalty to ranged attacks against friendly targets and gives +20 bonus to Stealth Tests. The mist disperses if concentration is broken. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Writhing Mists

object.description: Grants knowledge about all nearby storms including direction, speed, intensity, whether gathering or subsiding, and duration. Also reveals if a storm has magical properties.
object.name: Stormsense

object.description: Summons a powerful storm in the region that builds in intensity over time. The storm progresses through three stages: Near Gale, Strong Gale, and Violent Storm. This non-magical storm cannot be dispelled.
object.name: Ocean's Fury

object.description: Summons one of Mathlann's watery maidens to distract foes. Every Round, characters within 20 yards, must pass a Difficult (-10) Cool Test or become beguiled, rendering them Helpless except to move toward the Oceanid. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Mistress of the Deep

object.description: Envelops a single-masted ship with protective magic, providing Armour 2 Trait that doesn't add weight penalties. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Armour of Mathlann

object.description: Enables a target to breathe underwater. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Waterlungs

object.description: Extends the effective range of your Animal Telepathy and Companion Traits with your Animal Familiar the standard 4-yard limit to Willpower miles. Familiars cannot assist spellcasting through a long-range bond.
object.name: Greater Spirit Bond

object.description: Projects your thoughts as an audible message across vast distances. Functions only with recipients you've previously encountered or exchanged correspondence with. Transmissions may last up to one minute and are perceived in your natural speaking voice. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Psychic Sending

object.description: Transforms your fingertip into a light-emitting writing tool. Allows inscription in any known language onto solid surfaces or suspended in air. Cannot create images, only text. The glowing script produces light comparable to a candle and remains visible for a duration equal to your Willpower Bonus in hours.
object.name: Divine Stylus

object.description: Channels the mystical essence of Hoeth into a blade. It counts as Magical and gains the Fast Quality. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Crucible of Light

object.description: Reveals the magical attributes, functions, curses, and bound entities within an enchanted object. Successfully passing a Challenging (+0) Intelligence Test unveils the item's creation method. Additional Success Levels provide information about its creator. For exceptionally powerful artifacts, complete understanding sufficient for replication may necessitate multiple castings via an Extended Intelligence Test.
object.name: Arcane Insight

object.description: Channels the primordial language predating the Old Ones, enabling universal communication with all mortal beings and animals. Complex concepts require an Intelligence Test from either party. Bystanders perceive only incomprehensible sounds unless they know Anoqeyan and succeed on an Average (+20) Language (Magick) Test. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: The Primary Words

object.description: Grants an animal temporary intellectual enhancement, boosting its Intelligence and Willpower by +20 while removing its Bestial and Skittish Traits. The enhanced creature gains capacity for complex communication and understanding.
object.name: Enlightenment

object.description: Accesses dormant memories within the target's subconsciousness. Guarantees automatic success on their next Lore or non-magical Language Test with bonus Success Levels equal to your Casting Test result. Requires plausible prior exposure to the knowledge being recalled. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Mnemonic Control

object.description: Establishes mystical barriers with one of four possible effects: Forgetfulness (erases recent memories), Purity (inflicts (Mutations × 6) Damage that ignores armor and Toughness Bonus while repelling Daemons), Surveillance (allows remote viewing within the warded area by concentrating for one Round), or Truthfulness (prevents falsehoods within the area). Only one warding per location is possible, though it can be maintained with a CN 0 Casting Test before expiration. Special overcasting rules apply.
object.name: Sacred Wards

object.description: Captures and anchors a Ghost's essence into a waystone or leyline. Both the spirit and its intended vessel must be within the spell's range. Recently deceased individuals (within the last hour) can have their spirits preserved before departing to the afterlife. Unwilling spirits may resist by making a Cool Test, with each Success Level increasing the spell's Casting Number by 1 for every SL it scores.
object.name: Soulcraft

object.description: Infuses a non-magical arrow with arcane energy. The enchanted arrow counts as magical and gains +1 to Damage.
object.name: Bless Arrow

object.description: Induces tranquility and mental peace in the target. Removes any Prejudice, Animosity, Fear, or Frenzy effects if you succeed on a Challenging (+0) Fellowship Test.
object.name: Calm

object.description: Accelerates plant growth and vitality through your touch. Affected plants grow to their maximum size and productivity at their natural pace, even in poor growing conditions. Dead plants return to life within a day, restoring them to their previous living state.
object.name: Greenfinger

object.description: Makes magical energies visible in your vicinity. Magical objects and creatures within range glow brightly enough to be seen, even if hidden.
object.name: Reveal Magic

object.description: Channels diagnostic wisdom to identify ailments. The spell reveals the names and effects of any diseases affecting a person, plant, or animal within your touch range.
object.name: Identify Disease

object.description: Causes dirt and grime to fall away from the touched target, leaving objects, people, or animals perfectly clean. When cast on a surface, cleans an area with radius equal to your Willpower Bonus yards.
object.name: Remove Dirt

object.description: Designate monitoring area. Become aware of any creature or spirit Size Tiny or larger enters the alarmed area. If you are sleeping, it wakes you up.
object.name: Magic Alarm

object.description: You communicate with an animal. Characters who know Anoqeyin can attempt an Average (+20) Language (Magick) Test to understand the exchange. While the spell is active, you can use Charm Skill on the target animal (instead of Charm Animal Skill).
object.name: Speak with Animal

object.description: Your words magically command attention and respect. Normal or shouted speech carries for triple its natural range and provides a +10 bonus to Intimidation and Leadership Tests. The bonus is lost if listeners pass a Difficult (-10) Perception Test to notice the unnatural cadences in your voice.
object.name: Voice of Iron

object.description: Shield yourself against insects and weather. Tiny and Little creatures with the Swarm Trait cannot attack you. You are immune to the effects of Cold and Heat Exposure and receive 1 Damage less from cold-based and heat-based attacks.
object.name: Zone of Comfort

object.description: Banishes a Ghost, Spectre, Lesser Daemon, or Daemonic Beast. If you win an Opposed Willpower/Cool Test, the target is sent back to the spirit-realm or Realm of Chaos from which it originated.
object.name: Lesser Banishment

object.description: Conceal your thoughts and emotions. Intuition and mind-reading or scrying spell Tests against you are Very Hard (-30).
object.name: Masking the Mind

object.description: After passing a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test, you can cure the target of one disease or extract one poison. If you Fumble the Test, you contract the disease or poison yourself.
object.name: Purify Body

object.description: Imbues a non-magical plant with a permanent magical property. Chose one: Hardy (resistant to poor lighting, dry soil, and adverse temperature conditions), Nourishing (fruits, nuts, roots, or leaves weigh half the normal Encumbrance to satisfy food requirements), and Vessel (a Lesser Daemon, Minor Elemental, or soul can be bound into the plant as if it was a Power Stone).
object.name: Enchant Plant
